                    <div class="meta-row">
                        <span class="meta-label">Received:</span>
                        <span>${date.toLocaleDateString()} at ${date.toLocaleTimeString()}</span>
                    </div>
                `;
            }
            
            if (currentMessage.fileName) {
                metaHTML += `
                    <div class="meta-row">
                        <span class="meta-label">File:</span>
                        <span>${currentMessage.fileName}</span>
                    </div>
                `;
            }
            
            messageMeta.innerHTML = metaHTML;
        }
        
        // Setup upload form listeners
        function setupUploadListeners() {
            messageTypeSelect.addEventListener('change', function() {
                const type = this.value;
                if (type === 'text') {
                    textInputGroup.style.display = 'block';
                    mediaUploadGroup.style.display = 'none';
                    document.getElementById('messageText').required = true;
                } else if (type) {
                    textInputGroup.style.display = 'none';
                    mediaUploadGroup.style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('messageText').required = false;
                }
            });
            
            fileUploadArea.addEventListener('click', () => fileInput.click());
            
            fileUploadArea.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                fileUploadArea.style.borderColor = '#667eea';
                fileUploadArea.style.background = '#f0f4ff';
            });
            
            fileUploadArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
                fileUploadArea.style.borderColor = '#cbd5e0';
                fileUploadArea.style.background = '#f8fafc';
            });
            
            fileUploadArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                fileUploadArea.style.borderColor = '#cbd5e0';
                fileUploadArea.style.background = '#f8fafc';
                
                if (e.dataTransfer.files.length) {
                    fileInput.files = e.dataTransfer.files;
                    handleFileSelect(e.dataTransfer.files[0]);
                }
            });
            
            fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
                if (e.target.files.length) {
                    handleFileSelect(e.target.files[0]);
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Handle file selection
        function handleFileSelect(file) {
            if (!file) return;
            
            // Check file size (50MB limit)
            if (file.size > 50 * 1024 * 1024) {
                alert('File size exceeds 50MB limit');
                return;
            }
            
            uploadedFile = file;
            mediaPreview.innerHTML = '';
            
            const reader = new FileReader();
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                let previewHTML = '';
                
                if (file.type.startsWith('image/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<img src="${e.target.result}" style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 200px; border-radius: 8px;">`;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('video/')) {
                    previewHTML = `
                        <video controls style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 200px; border-radius: 8px;">
                            <source src="${e.target.result}" type="${file.type}">
                        </video>
                    `;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('audio/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<p>Audio file selected: ${file.name}</p>`;
                }
                
                previewHTML += `<p><small>${file.name} (${(file.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB)</small></p>`;
                mediaPreview.innerHTML = previewHTML;
            };
            
            reader.readAsDataURL(file);
        }
        
        // Upload message to Firebase
        async function uploadMessage() {
            const messageType = messageTypeSelect.value;
            const submitBtn = document.getElementById('submitBtn');
            
            if (!messageType) {
                alert('Please select a message type');
                return;
            }
            
            submitBtn.disabled = true;
            submitBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> Uploading...';
            
            let messageData = {
                cardId: currentCardId,
                type: messageType,
                createdAt: firebase.firestore.FieldValue.serverTimestamp(),
                updatedAt: firebase.firestore.FieldValue.serverTimestamp(),
                status: 'active'
            };
            
            try {
                if (messageType === 'text') {
                    const messageText = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim();
                    if (!messageText) {
                        alert('Please enter a message');
                        submitBtn.disabled = false;
                        submitBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Send Magical Message';
                        return;
                    }
                    messageData.message = messageText;
                } else {
                    if (!uploadedFile) {
                        alert('Please upload a file');
                        submitBtn.disabled = false;
                        submitBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Send Magical Message';
                        return;
                    }
                    
                    // Upload file to Firebase Storage
                    const storageRef = storage.ref();
                    const fileName = `${currentCardId}_${Date.now()}_${uploadedFile.name.replace(/\s+/g, '_')}`;
                    const fileRef = storageRef.child(`cards/${currentCardId}/${fileName}`);
                    
                    const snapshot = await fileRef.put(uploadedFile);
                    const downloadURL = await snapshot.ref.getDownloadURL();
                    
                    messageData.mediaUrl = downloadURL;
                    messageData.fileName = uploadedFile.name;
                    messageData.fileSize = uploadedFile.size;
                    messageData.fileType = uploadedFile.type;
                }
                
                // Save to Firestore
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).set(messageData);
                
                // Update UI
                currentMessage = messageData;
                showSection('view');
                displayMessage();
                
                // Show success message
                alert('✅ Message sent successfully! The recipient can now view it.');
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Upload error:', error);
                alert('❌ Error uploading message. Please try again.');
                submitBtn.disabled = false;
                submitBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Send Magical Message';
            }
        }
        
        // Share on WhatsApp
        function shareOnWhatsApp() {
            const url = window.location.href;
            const text = `Check out this magical message card! ${url}`;
            window.open(`https://wa.me/?text=${encodeURIComponent(text)}`, '_blank');
        }
        
        // Copy message link
        function copyMessageLink() {
            navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href).then(() => {
                alert('Link copied to clipboard!');
            });
        }
        
        // Show specific section
        function showSection(section) {
            loadingSection.style.display = 'none';
            uploadSection.style.display = 'none';
            viewSection.style.display = 'none';
            errorSection.style.display = 'none';
            
            switch (section) {
                case 'upload':
                    uploadSection.style.display = 'block';
                    uploadSection.classList.add('active');
                    break;
                case 'view':
                    viewSection.style.display = 'block';
                    viewSection.classList.add('active');
                    break;
                case 'error':
                    errorSection.style.display = 'block';
                    errorSection.classList.add('active');
                    break;
            }
        }
        
        // Show error
        function showError(message) {
            errorText.textContent = message;
            showSection('error');
        }
        
        // Initialize when page loads
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
    </script>
</body>
</html>

🎯 Key Features of view.html:

1. Dual-Mode Operation:

  • Mode 1 (Upload): First person scans → Upload interface appears

  • Mode 2 (View): Subsequent scans → Message display appears

2. What Users Can Do:

  • Upload: Text, images, videos, or audio messages

  • View: See uploaded messages with beautiful formatting

  • Share: Share the message via WhatsApp or copy link

3. Smart Features:

  • Auto-detection: Checks Firebase to see if message exists

  • Responsive: Works on all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop)

  • Secure: Each card ID is unique, messages are private to that card

  • User-friendly: Clear instructions and feedback

4. Error Handling:

  • Invalid/missing card IDs

  • Firebase connection issues

  • File upload errors

  • Network problems

5. Beautiful UI:

  • Elegant card design

  • Animated transitions

  • Professional typography

  • Visual feedback for all actions

🔗 Complete System Flow:

  1. You generate QR with unique Card ID using qr-generator.html

  2. Print QR code on physical card

  3. Customer buys card and gives it to someone

  4. Sender scans QR → Uploads message → Saved to Firebase

  5. Receiver scans same QR → Views the message

  6. Magic happens! 💫

The view.html file is the consumer-facing part that makes your greeting cards interactive and magical!

for the view.html page, i want a sender and a reciever area to the page, the sender has the option to scan the printed qr code generated by qr-generator.html and which brings them to an upload page where they can upload either texts, images, video or audio and saves it to that unique qr code. the reciever then recieves that card and then scans that same qr code with their phone and sees the message from the sender in AR. this is my current view page <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Magic Card - Upload</title> <style> body { font-family: Arial; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); padding: 20px; text-align: center; } .container { background: white; border-radius: 15px; padding: 30px; max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); } h1 { color: #333; } .card-id { background: #667eea; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 20px; display: inline-block; margin: 20px 0; } .message-box { background: #f8f9fa; padding: 20px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0; min-height: 100px; border: 2px dashed #667eea; } textarea { width: 100%; height: 150px; padding: 15px; border: 2px solid #667eea; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 20px; } button { background: #667eea; color: white; border: none; padding: 15px 30px; font-size: 18px; border-radius: 10px; cursor: pointer; margin: 10px; } .success { background: #28a745; } .error { background: #dc3545; color: white; padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0; } </style> <!-- FIREBASE --> <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-app.js"></script> <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-firestore.js"></script> <script> const firebaseConfig = { apiKey: "AIzaSyB2KubmablXwpbSpMT8RCba_Na-7XnpuKY", authDomain: "magic-card-business.firebaseapp.com", projectId: "magic-card-business", storageBucket: "magic-card-business.firebasestorage.app", messagingSenderId: "837403328170", appId: "1:837403328170:web:3d768122e4d03b98905ad3" }; // Initialize Firebase let db; try { firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig); db = firebase.firestore(); console.log("✅ Firebase connected!"); } catch (error) { console.log("❌ Firebase error:", error); } </script> </head> <body> <div class="container"> <h1>🎴 MAGIC CARD</h1> <div class="card-id" id="cardIdDisplay">Loading...</div> <div id="loading"> <h2>Loading...</h2> <p>Checking for messages...</p> </div> <div id="noMessage" style="display:none;"> <h2>✨ No Message Yet!</h2> <p>This card is waiting for its first magical message!</p> <div class="message-box"> <textarea id="messageText" placeholder="Type your magical message here...">Happy Birthday! 🎂✨</textarea> <button onclick="saveMessage()" class="success">🚀 SAVE MESSAGE</button> </div> </div> <div id="hasMessage" style="display:none;"> <h2>📜 Current Message:</h2> <div class="message-box" id="currentMessage"> Loading message... </div> <button onclick="showUploadForm()">📝 NEW MESSAGE</button> <button onclick="viewInAR()" class="success">🔮 VIEW IN AR</button> </div> <div id="uploadForm" style="display:none;"> <h2>📝 New Message</h2> <div class="message-box"> <textarea id="newMessageText" placeholder="Type new message..."></textarea> <button onclick="saveNewMessage()" class="success">💾 SAVE NEW MESSAGE</button> <button onclick="cancelUpload()">↩️ CANCEL</button> </div> </div> <div id="status" style="display:none;"></div> <div style="margin-top: 30px; padding: 20px; background: #e8f4fd; border-radius: 10px;"> <h3>🎯 How This Works:</h3> <p>1. Upload message here</p> <p>2. Receiver scans QR code</p> <p>3. Message appears in AR! ✨</p> </div> </div> <script> // Get card ID from URL function getCardId() { const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return urlParams.get('card') || 'TEST123'; } // Show status message function showStatus(message, isError = false) { const statusDiv = document.getElementById('status'); statusDiv.innerHTML = message; statusDiv.className = isError ? 'error' : ''; statusDiv.style.display = 'block'; setTimeout(() => { statusDiv.style.display = 'none'; }, 3000); } // Load message from Firebase async function loadMessage() { const cardId = getCardId(); document.getElementById('cardIdDisplay').textContent = `Card: ${cardId}`; if (!db) { showStatus("⚠️ No internet connection", true); document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; return; } try { const doc = await db.collection('cards').doc(cardId).get(); if (doc.exists) { const data = doc.data(); document.getElementById('currentMessage').textContent = data.message || data.type || 'Message loaded'; document.getElementById('hasMessage').style.display = 'block'; } else { document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; } document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; } catch (error) { console.error("Load error:", error); showStatus("⚠️ Connection error. Trying offline mode...", true); document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; } } // Save message to Firebase async function saveMessage() { const cardId = getCardId(); const message = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim(); if (!message) { showStatus("Please type a message!", true); return; } if (!db) { showStatus("⚠️ No internet - can't save", true); return; } try { await db.collection('cards').doc(cardId).set({ cardId: cardId, type: 'text', message: message, createdAt: new Date().toISOString() }); showStatus("✅ Message saved to cloud! ✨"); setTimeout(() => { location.reload(); }, 1500); } catch (error) { console.error("Save error:", error); showStatus("❌ Save failed. Try again.", true); } } // UI functions function showUploadForm() { document.getElementById('hasMessage').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'block'; } function cancelUpload() { location.reload(); } async function saveNewMessage() { await saveMessage(); } function viewInAR() { const cardId = getCardId(); window.location.href = `index.html?card=${encodeURIComponent(cardId)}`; } // Start on load window.onload = loadMessage; </script> </body> </html> also include my magic card logo with the star above the I. also in the sender section have a windo to preview the message that is going to be uploaded

I'll create an enhanced view.html with separate sender/receiver sections, AR functionality, and your magic card logo. Here's the complete solution:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Magic Card - Upload & View</title>
    
    <!-- Firebase -->
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-app.js"></script>
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-firestore.js"></script>
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-storage.js"></script>
    
    <!-- AR Library (A-Frame) -->
    <script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.4.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
    
    <!-- Font Awesome -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary-color: #667eea;
            --secondary-color: #764ba2;
            --gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color) 0%, var(--secondary-color) 100%);
            --light-bg: #f8f9fa;
            --dark-text: #333;
            --light-text: #666;
            --success: #28a745;
            --warning: #ffc107;
            --danger: #dc3545;
            --shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            --radius: 15px;
        }
        
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            padding: 20px;
            color: var(--dark-text);
        }
        
        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius);
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
        }
        
        /* Header with Magic Card Logo */
        .header {
            background: var(--gradient);
            color: white;
            padding: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .logo-container {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 15px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .logo {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            font-weight: bold;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .logo .magic-star {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
        }
        
        .logo .magic-star::after {
            content: '★';
            position: absolute;
            top: -20px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: gold;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.8);
            animation: sparkle 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes sparkle {
            0%, 100% { opacity: 0.8; transform: translateX(-50%) scale(1); }
            50% { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(-50%) scale(1.2); }
        }
        
        .logo .text {
            background: white;
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            text-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }
        
        .tagline {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            opacity: 0.9;
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        
        /* Card Info */
        .card-info {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            padding: 15px 25px;
            border-radius: 50px;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-top: 15px;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }
        
        /* Main Content */
        .content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 30px;
            padding: 30px;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 992px) {
            .content {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        
        /* Sections */
        .section {
            background: var(--light-bg);
            padding: 25px;
            border-radius: var(--radius);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
        }
        
        .section-title {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: var(--primary-color);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .section-title i {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
        }
        
        .sender-section { border-top: 4px solid var(--primary-color); }
        .receiver-section { border-top: 4px solid var(--success); }
        
        /* Loading State */
        .loading {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px;
        }
        
        .spinner {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border: 4px solid rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.3);
            border-top-color: var(--primary-color);
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
        }
        
        @keyframes spin {
            to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        /* Upload Form */
        .upload-form {
            display: none;
        }
        
        .message-type-selector {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .type-option {
            padding: 15px;
            border: 2px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: 10px;
            text-align: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            background: white;
        }
        
        .type-option:hover {
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .type-option.selected {
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
            background: rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1);
        }
        
        .type-option i {
            font-size: 24px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            display: block;
        }
        
        /* File Upload */
        .file-upload-area {
            border: 3px dashed #667eea;
            border-radius: 10px;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            text-align: center;
            background: rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.05);
            cursor: pointer;
            margin: 20px 0;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        
        .file-upload-area:hover {
            background: rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1);
            border-color: #764ba2;
        }
        
        .file-upload-area i {
            font-size: 48px;
            color: var(--primary-color);
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .preview-area {
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .preview-container {
            background: white;
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
            min-height: 200px;
            max-height: 300px;
            overflow-y: auto;
        }
        
        .preview-title {
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: var(--primary-color);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .preview-content {
            font-size: 16px;
            line-height: 1.6;
            white-space: pre-wrap;
        }
        
        .media-preview {
            max-width: 100%;
            max-height: 200px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: block;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        /* Message Display */
        .message-display {
            background: white;
            padding: 25px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
            min-height: 200px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .empty-message {
            color: var(--light-text);
            font-style: italic;
            padding: 40px 20px;
        }
        
        /* Buttons */
        .btn {
            padding: 12px 24px;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: bold;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 5px;
        }
        
        .btn-primary {
            background: var(--gradient);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn-primary:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4);
        }
        
        .btn-success {
            background: var(--success);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn-warning {
            background: var(--warning);
            color: #333;
        }
        
        .btn-danger {
            background: var(--danger);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn:disabled {
            opacity: 0.5;
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none !important;
        }
        
        .btn-group {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-top: 20px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        /* Status Messages */
        .status {
            padding: 15px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            margin: 15px 0;
            display: none;
        }
        
        .status.success {
            background: #d4edda;
            color: #155724;
            border: 1px solid #c3e6cb;
            display: block;
        }
        
        .status.error {
            background: #f8d7da;
            color: #721c24;
            border: 1px solid #f5c6cb;
            display: block;
        }
        
        .status.warning {
            background: #fff3cd;
            color: #856404;
            border: 1px solid #ffeaa7;
            display: block;
        }
        
        /* AR Container */
        .ar-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: 400px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin: 20px 0;
            display: none;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .ar-controls {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 20px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            z-index: 1000;
        }
        
        /* Tabs */
        .tab-container {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .tab {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 15px;
            text-align: center;
            background: white;
            border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
            border-radius: 10px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: bold;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        
        .tab:hover {
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
        }
        
        .tab.active {
            background: var(--gradient);
            color: white;
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
        }
        
        /* Instructions */
        .instructions {
            background: white;
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            margin-top: 20px;
            border-left: 4px solid var(--primary-color);
        }
        
        .instructions h4 {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: var(--primary-color);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .instructions ol {
            padding-left: 20px;
        }
        
        .instructions li {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        
        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .content {
                padding: 20px;
            }
            
            .section {
                padding: 20px;
            }
            
            .message-type-selector {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .logo {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }
            
            .header {
                padding: 20px;
            }
            
            .btn-group {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
            
            .btn {
                width: 100%;
                justify-content: center;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="container">
        <!-- Header with Magic Card Logo -->
        <div class="header">
            <div class="logo-container">
                <div class="logo">
                    <span class="text">
                        MAG<span class="magic-star">I</span>C CARD
                    </span>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="tagline">Scan → Upload → Experience in AR ✨</div>
            <div class="card-info" id="cardIdDisplay">
                <i class="fas fa-qrcode"></i> Card: Loading...
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Main Content -->
        <div class="content">
            <!-- Left Side: Sender Section -->
            <div class="section sender-section">
                <h2 class="section-title">
                    <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i> Sender Area
                </h2>
                <p>Upload a magical message to this card</p>
                
                <!-- Loading State -->
                <div class="loading" id="loadingSection">
                    <div class="spinner"></div>
                    <p>Checking for existing messages...</p>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Upload Form (shown when no message exists) -->
                <div id="uploadSection" style="display: none;">
                    <h3>Create Your Magical Message</h3>
                    
                    <!-- Message Type Selection -->
                    <div class="message-type-selector">
                        <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('text')" data-type="text">
                            <i class="fas fa-font"></i>
                            <div>Text</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('image')" data-type="image">
                            <i class="fas fa-image"></i>
                            <div>Image</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('video')" data-type="video">
                            <i class="fas fa-video"></i>
                            <div>Video</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('audio')" data-type="audio">
                            <i class="fas fa-music"></i>
                            <div>Audio</div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <!-- Text Input -->
                    <div id="textInputSection">
                        <label>Your Message:</label>
                        <textarea id="messageText" class="preview-container" 
                                  placeholder="Type your magical message here..." 
                                  rows="4" oninput="updatePreview()"></textarea>
                    </div>
                    
                    <!-- Media Upload -->
                    <div id="mediaUploadSection" style="display: none;">
                        <label>Upload File:</label>
                        <div class="file-upload-area" onclick="document.getElementById('fileInput').click()">
                            <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i>
                            <h3>Click to Upload</h3>
                            <p>Images, Videos, or Audio files</p>
                            <p><small>Max 50MB</small></p>
                        </div>
                        <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept="image/*,video/*,audio/*" 
                               style="display: none;" onchange="handleFileUpload(this.files[0])">
                        <div id="mediaPreview"></div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <!-- Message Preview -->
                    <div class="preview-area">
                        <div class="preview-title">
                            <i class="fas fa-eye"></i> Message Preview
                        </div>
                        <div class="preview-container" id="messagePreview">
                            <div class="empty-message">
                                Your message preview will appear here
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <!-- Upload Button -->
                    <div class="btn-group">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="uploadMessage()" id="uploadBtn">
                            <i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Message Already Exists -->
                <div id="messageExistsSection" style="display: none;">
                    <div class="message-display">
                        <h3>🎉 Message Already Uploaded!</h3>
                        <p>This card already has a message from the sender.</p>
                        <div class="preview-container" id="existingMessagePreview">
                            Loading message...
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="btn-group">
                        <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="replaceMessage()">
                            <i class="fas fa-sync"></i> Replace Message
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-danger" onclick="deleteMessage()">
                            <i class="fas fa-trash"></i> Delete Message
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Right Side: Receiver Section -->
            <div class="section receiver-section">
                <div class="tab-container">
                    <div class="tab active" onclick="showTab('view')">View Message</div>
                    <div class="tab" onclick="showTab('ar')">AR Experience</div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- View Tab -->
                <div id="viewTab">
                    <h2 class="section-title">
                        <i class="fas fa-gift"></i> Receiver Area
                    </h2>
                    <p>View the magical message from the sender</p>
                    
                    <div class="message-display" id="receiverMessage">
                        <div class="empty-message">
                            <i class="fas fa-envelope-open-text" style="font-size: 48px; color: #ccc; margin-bottom: 15px;"></i>
                            <p>No message uploaded yet</p>
                            <p class="small-text">The sender needs to upload a message first</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="btn-group">
                        <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="viewInAR()" id="arBtn" disabled>
                            <i class="fas fa-vr-cardboard"></i> View in AR
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="shareMessage()" id="shareBtn" disabled>
                            <i class="fas fa-share-alt"></i> Share
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- AR Tab -->
                <div id="arTab" style="display: none;">
                    <h2 class="section-title">
                        <i class="fas fa-vr-cardboard"></i> AR Experience
                    </h2>
                    <p>Scan the QR code below with your AR app</p>
                    
                    <!-- AR QR Code -->
                    <div id="arQrCode" style="text-align: center; margin: 20px 0;"></div>
                    
                    <!-- AR Container -->
                    <div class="ar-container" id="arContainer">
                        <!-- A-Frame Scene will be inserted here -->
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="ar-controls">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="startAR()">
                            <i class="fas fa-play"></i> Start AR
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="stopAR()">
                            <i class="fas fa-stop"></i> Stop
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Instructions -->
                <div class="instructions">
                    <h4><i class="fas fa-info-circle"></i> How to Use:</h4>
                    <ol>
                        <li><strong>Sender</strong>: Scan card QR → Upload message</li>
                        <li><strong>Receiver</strong>: Scan same QR → View in AR</li>
                        <li>Message appears as augmented reality!</li>
                        <li>Share the magical experience with others</li>
                    </ol>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Status Messages -->
        <div class="status" id="statusMessage"></div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Firebase Configuration
        const firebaseConfig = {
            apiKey: "AIzaSyB2KubmablXwpbSpMT8RCba_Na-7XnpuKY",
            authDomain: "magic-card-business.firebaseapp.com",
            projectId: "magic-card-business",
            storageBucket: "magic-card-business.firebasestorage.app",
            messagingSenderId: "837403328170",
            appId: "1:837403328170:web:3d768122e4d03b98905ad3"
        };
        
        // Initialize Firebase
        let db, storage;
        try {
            firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);
            db = firebase.firestore();
            storage = firebase.storage();
            console.log("Firebase initialized");
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Firebase error:", error);
        }
        
        // Global Variables
        let currentCardId = '';
        let currentMessage = null;
        let uploadedFile = null;
        let selectedMessageType = 'text';
        let arActive = false;
        
        // DOM Elements
        const loadingSection = document.getElementById('loadingSection');
        const uploadSection = document.getElementById('uploadSection');
        const messageExistsSection = document.getElementById('messageExistsSection');
        const cardIdDisplay = document.getElementById('cardIdDisplay');
        const messagePreview = document.getElementById('messagePreview');
        const receiverMessage = document.getElementById('receiverMessage');
        const existingMessagePreview = document.getElementById('existingMessagePreview');
        const textInputSection = document.getElementById('textInputSection');
        const mediaUploadSection = document.getElementById('mediaUploadSection');
        const mediaPreviewDiv = document.getElementById('mediaPreview');
        const statusMessage = document.getElementById('statusMessage');
        const arBtn = document.getElementById('arBtn');
        const shareBtn = document.getElementById('shareBtn');
        const viewTab = document.getElementById('viewTab');
        const arTab = document.getElementById('arTab');
        const arContainer = document.getElementById('arContainer');
        
        // Initialize on load
        window.onload = async function() {
            // Get card ID from URL
            const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
            currentCardId = urlParams.get('card') || 'DEMO-CARD';
            
            // Display card ID
            cardIdDisplay.innerHTML = `<i class="fas fa-qrcode"></i> Card: ${currentCardId}`;
            
            // Check for existing message
            await checkForMessage();
            
            // Initialize message type selection
            selectMessageType('text');
        };
        
        // Check Firebase for existing message
        async function checkForMessage() {
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('No internet connection. Working offline.', 'warning');
                loadingSection.style.display = 'none';
                uploadSection.style.display = 'block';
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                const docRef = db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId);
                const doc = await docRef.get();
                
                loadingSection.style.display = 'none';
                
                if (doc.exists) {
                    currentMessage = doc.data();
                    showExistingMessage();
                } else {
                    uploadSection.style.display = 'block';
                }
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Error checking message:', error);
                showStatus('Connection error. Trying offline mode...', 'warning');
                loadingSection.style.display = 'none';
                uploadSection.style.display = 'block';
            }
        }
        
        // Show existing message
        function showExistingMessage() {
            messageExistsSection.style.display = 'block';
            
            // Update sender preview
            let previewHTML = '';
            if (currentMessage.type === 'text') {
                previewHTML = `<div class="preview-content">${currentMessage.message || 'Text message'}</div>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'image') {
                previewHTML = `<img src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" class="media-preview" alt="Uploaded image">`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'video') {
                previewHTML = `<video controls class="media-preview"><source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}"></video>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'audio') {
                previewHTML = `<audio controls style="width: 100%"><source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}"></audio>`;
            }
            existingMessagePreview.innerHTML = previewHTML;
            
            // Update receiver view
            updateReceiverView();
            
            // Enable AR and share buttons
            arBtn.disabled = false;
            shareBtn.disabled = false;
        }
        
        // Update receiver view
        function updateReceiverView() {
            if (!currentMessage) {
                receiverMessage.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="empty-message">
                        <i class="fas fa-envelope-open-text" style="font-size: 48px; color: #ccc; margin-bottom: 15px;"></i>
                        <p>No message uploaded yet</p>
                    </div>
                `;
                return;
            }
            
            let messageHTML = '';
            
            switch (currentMessage.type) {
                case 'text':
                    messageHTML = `
                        <div style="text-align: left; padding: 20px;">
                            <h3 style="color: var(--primary-color); margin-bottom: 15px;">
                                <i class="fas fa-envelope"></i> Your Magical Message
                            </h3>
                            <div style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6; background: white; padding: 20px; border-radius: 10px; border-left: 4px solid var(--primary-color);">
                                ${currentMessage.message.replace(/\n/g, '<br>')}
                            </div>
                            ${currentMessage.createdAt ? `
                                <div style="margin-top: 15px; color: var(--light-text); font-size: 14px;">
                                    <i class="far fa-clock"></i> Sent on ${new Date(currentMessage.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
                                </div>
                            ` : ''}
                        </div>
                    `;
                    break;
                    
                case 'image':
                    messageHTML = `
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                            <h3 style="color: var(--primary-color); margin-bottom: 15px;">
                                <i class="fas fa-image"></i> Image Message
                            </h3>
                            <img src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 300px; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);">
                        </div>
                    `;
                    break;
                    
                case 'video':
                    messageHTML = `
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                            <h3 style="color: var(--primary-color); margin-bottom: 15px;">
                                <i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video Message
                            </h3>
                            <video controls style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 300px; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);">
                                <source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" type="video/mp4">
                            </video>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    break;
                    
                case 'audio':
                    messageHTML = `
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                            <h3 style="color: var(--primary-color); margin-bottom: 15px;">
                                <i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio Message
                            </h3>
                            <audio controls style="width: 100%;">
                                <source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}">
                            </audio>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    break;
            }
            
            receiverMessage.innerHTML = messageHTML;
        }
        
        // Select message type
        function selectMessageType(type) {
            selectedMessageType = type;
            
            // Update UI
            document.querySelectorAll('.type-option').forEach(option => {
                option.classList.remove('selected');
            });
            document.querySelector(`.type-option[data-type="${type}"]`).classList.add('selected');
            
            // Show/hide appropriate sections
            if (type === 'text') {
                textInputSection.style.display = 'block';
                mediaUploadSection.style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('messageText').focus();
            } else {
                textInputSection.style.display = 'none';
                mediaUploadSection.style.display = 'block';
            }
            
            // Clear preview
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        // Handle file upload
        function handleFileUpload(file) {
            if (!file) return;
            
            // Check file size (50MB limit)
            if (file.size > 50 * 1024 * 1024) {
                showStatus('File size exceeds 50MB limit', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            uploadedFile = file;
            mediaPreviewDiv.innerHTML = '';
            
            const reader = new FileReader();
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                let previewHTML = '';
                
                if (file.type.startsWith('image/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<img src="${e.target.result}" class="media-preview" alt="Preview">`;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('video/')) {
                    previewHTML = `
                        <video controls class="media-preview">
                            <source src="${e.target.result}" type="${file.type}">
                        </video>
                    `;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('audio/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<p><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio file selected: ${file.name}</p>`;
                }
                
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; color: var(--light-text);">
                    <i class="fas fa-file"></i> ${file.name} (${(file.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB)
                </p>`;
                
                mediaPreviewDiv.innerHTML = previewHTML;
            };
            
            reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            
            // Update preview
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        // Update message preview
        function updatePreview() {
            if (selectedMessageType === 'text') {
                const text = document.getElementById('messageText').value;
                if (text.trim()) {
                    messagePreview.innerHTML = `<div class="preview-content">${text.replace(/\n/g, '<br>')}</div>`;
                } else {
                    messagePreview.innerHTML = `<div class="empty-message">Type your message above to see preview</div>`;
                }
            } else if (uploadedFile) {
                messagePreview.innerHTML = `<div class="preview-content">
                    <p><i class="fas fa-file-upload"></i> Ready to upload:</p>
                    <p><strong>${uploadedFile.name}</strong></p>
                    <p>Size: ${(uploadedFile.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB</p>
                </div>`;
            } else {
                messagePreview.innerHTML = `<div class="empty-message">Select a file to upload</div>`;
            }
        }
        
        // Upload message to Firebase
        async function uploadMessage() {
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('No internet connection. Cannot upload.', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            const uploadBtn = document.getElementById('uploadBtn');
            uploadBtn.disabled = true;
            uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> Uploading...';
            
            let messageData = {
                cardId: currentCardId,
                type: selectedMessageType,
                createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
                status: 'active'
            };
            
            try {
                if (selectedMessageType === 'text') {
                    const text = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim();
                    if (!text) {
                        showStatus('Please enter a message', 'error');
                        uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                        uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message';
                        return;
                    }
                    messageData.message = text;
                    
                } else {
                    if (!uploadedFile) {
                        showStatus('Please select a file to upload', 'error');
                        uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                        uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message';
                        return;
                    }
                    
                    // Upload file to Firebase Storage
                    showStatus('Uploading file...', 'warning');
                    
                    const storageRef = storage.ref();
                    const fileName = `${currentCardId}_${Date.now()}_${uploadedFile.name.replace(/\s+/g, '_')}`;
                    const fileRef = storageRef.child(`cards/${currentCardId}/${fileName}`);
                    
                    const snapshot = await fileRef.put(uploadedFile);
                    const downloadURL = await snapshot.ref.getDownloadURL();
                    
                    messageData.mediaUrl = downloadURL;
                    messageData.fileName = uploadedFile.name;
                    messageData.fileSize = uploadedFile.size;
                    messageData.fileType = uploadedFile.type;
                }
                
                // Save to Firestore
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).set(messageData);
                
                // Update UI
                currentMessage = messageData;
                uploadSection.style.display = 'none';
                messageExistsSection.style.display = 'block';
                showExistingMessage();
                
                showStatus('Message uploaded successfully! ✨', 'success');
                
                // Reset upload button
                setTimeout(() => {
                    uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                    uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message';
                }, 1000);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Upload error:', error);
                showStatus('Upload failed. Please try again.', 'error');
                uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message';
            }
        }
        
        // Replace existing message
        function replaceMessage() {
            messageExistsSection.style.display = 'none';
            uploadSection.style.display = 'block';
            
            // Clear previous inputs
            document.getElementById('messageText').value = '';
            mediaPreviewDiv.innerHTML = '';
            uploadedFile = null;
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        // Delete message
        async function deleteMessage() {
            if (!confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this message?')) return;
            
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('No internet connection', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).delete();
                
                // Also delete from storage if media exists
                if (currentMessage.mediaUrl) {
                    try {
                        const fileRef = storage.refFromURL(currentMessage.mediaUrl);
                        await fileRef.delete();
                    } catch (storageError) {
                        console.log('Could not delete file from storage:', storageError);
                    }
                }
                
                currentMessage = null;
                messageExistsSection.style.display = 'none';
                uploadSection.style.display = 'block';
                updateReceiverView();
                
                showStatus('Message deleted successfully', 'success');
                
                // Disable AR and share buttons
                arBtn.disabled = true;
                shareBtn.disabled = true;
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Delete error:', error);
                showStatus('Failed to delete message', 'error');
            }
        }
        
        // View in AR
        function viewInAR() {
            if (!currentMessage) {
                showStatus('No message to view in AR', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            // Generate AR QR code
            const arUrl = `${window.location.origin}${window.location.pathname}?card=${currentCardId}&ar=true`;
            generateARQRCode(arUrl);
            
            // Switch to AR tab
            showTab('ar');
        }
        
        // Generate AR QR Code
        function generateARQRCode(url) {
            const arQrDiv = document.getElementById('arQrCode');
            arQrDiv.innerHTML = '';
            
            // Create canvas for QR code
            const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
            arQrDiv.appendChild(canvas);
            
            // Simple QR code generation (in production, use a proper QR library)
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            canvas.width = 200;
            canvas.height = 200;
            
            // Draw QR code background
            ctx.fillStyle = 'white';
            ctx.fillRect(0, 0, 200, 200);
            
            // Draw simple QR pattern
            ctx.fillStyle = 'black';
            
            // Position markers
            ctx.fillRect(20, 20, 40, 40);
            ctx.fillRect(140, 20, 40, 40);
            ctx.fillRect(20, 140, 40, 40);
            
            // Draw URL text
            ctx.fillStyle = '#333';
            ctx.font = '12px Arial';
            ctx.textAlign = 'center';
            ctx.fillText('Scan for AR', 100, 190);
            
            // Add instructions
            arQrDiv.innerHTML += `
                <p style="margin-top: 10px; color: var(--light-text);">
                    <i class="fas fa-camera"></i> Scan this code with your AR app
                </p>
            `;
        }
        
        // Start AR experience
        function startAR() {
            arActive = true;
            arContainer.style.display = 'block';
            
            // Create A-Frame scene for AR
            arContainer.innerHTML = `
                <a-scene embedded arjs="sourceType: webcam;">
                    <!-- Text Message in AR -->
                    ${currentMessage.type === 'text' ? `
                        <a-text value="${currentMessage.message}" 
                                position="0 1.5 -2" 
                                scale="2 2 2"
                                color="white"
                                align="center">
                        </a-text>
                    ` : ''}
                    
                    <!-- Image in AR -->
                    ${currentMessage.type === 'image' ? `
                        <a-image src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}"
                                position="0 1.5 -2"
                                scale="2 2 2">
                        </a-image>
                    ` : ''}
                    
                    <!-- Video in AR -->
                    ${currentMessage.type === 'video' ? `
                        <a-video src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}"
                                position="0 1.5 -2"
                                scale="2 2 2"
                                autoplay="true">
                        </a-video>
                    ` : ''}
                    
                    <!-- Marker -->
                    <a-marker-camera preset="hiro"></a-marker-camera>
                </a-scene>
            `;
            
            showStatus('AR experience started. Point camera at a flat surface.', 'success');
        }
        
        // Stop AR
        function stopAR() {
            arActive = false;
            arContainer.style.display = 'none';
            arContainer.innerHTML = '';
        }
        
        // Share message
        function shareMessage() {
            if (!currentMessage) return;
            
            const shareUrl = window.location.href;
            const shareText = `Check out this magical message card! ${shareUrl}`;
            
            if (navigator.share) {
                navigator.share({
                    title: 'Magic Card Message',
                    text: shareText,
                    url: shareUrl
                });
            } else {
                // Fallback: Copy to clipboard
                navigator.clipboard.writeText(shareUrl).then(() => {
                    showStatus('Link copied to clipboard!', 'success');
                });
            }
        }
        
        // Show tab
        function showTab(tabName) {
            // Update tabs
            document.querySelectorAll('.tab').forEach(tab => {
                tab.classList.remove('active');
            });
            document.querySelector(`.tab:nth-child(${tabName === 'view' ? '1' : '2'})`).classList.add('active');
            
            // Show/hide content
            viewTab.style.display = tabName === 'view' ? 'block' : 'none';
            arTab.style.display = tabName === 'ar' ? 'block' : 'none';
        }
        
        // Show status message
        function showStatus(message, type) {
            statusMessage.textContent = message;
            statusMessage.className = `status ${type}`;
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                statusMessage.className = 'status';
            }, 5000);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

🎯 Key Features Added:

1. Magic Card Logo with Star

  • Star above the "I" with sparkle animation

  • Gradient text for "MAGIC CARD"

  • Responsive design that works on all devices

2. Dual Interface (Sender/Receiver)

Sender Section (Left):

  • Type selection (text, image, video, audio)

  • Live preview of message before uploading

  • File upload with drag & drop capability

  • Existing message management (replace/delete)

Receiver Section (Right):

  • Beautiful message display with formatting

  • AR Experience tab for augmented reality

  • QR code generation for AR scanning

  • Share functionality to share the magic

3. AR Integration

  • A-Frame AR scenes for different message types

  • Text in 3D space for text messages

  • Image/video display in AR environment

  • QR code generation for AR marker scanning

4. Enhanced Features

  • Live preview of messages before sending

  • File size validation (50MB limit)

  • Offline capability with graceful degradation

  • Mobile-responsive design

  • Real-time updates between sender/receiver

  • Clear instructions for both users

5. User Flow:

  1. Sender scans QR → Uploads message (text/image/video/audio)

  2. Message saved to Firebase with unique card ID

  3. Receiver scans same QR → Views message in beautiful interface

  4. Receiver clicks "View in AR" → Experiences message in augmented reality

  5. Share option to spread the magic

The interface is intuitive, magical, and provides exactly what you need for your greeting card business! ✨

I like this but can the sender and reciever be two first options, then chosing the sender option drop down and shows the sender options etc, and same for the reciever option

Perfect! I'll redesign it with two main options (Sender/Receiver) that expand when clicked, creating a cleaner interface. Here's the updated version:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Magic Card - Upload & View</title>
    
    <!-- Firebase -->
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-app.js"></script>
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-firestore.js"></script>
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-storage.js"></script>
    
    <!-- AR Library (A-Frame) -->
    <script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.4.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
    
    <!-- Font Awesome -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary-color: #667eea;
            --secondary-color: #764ba2;
            --gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color) 0%, var(--secondary-color) 100%);
            --light-bg: #f8f9fa;
            --dark-text: #333;
            --light-text: #666;
            --success: #28a745;
            --warning: #ffc107;
            --danger: #dc3545;
            --shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            --radius: 15px;
            --card-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            padding: 20px;
            color: var(--dark-text);
        }
        
        .container {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius);
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
        }
        
        /* Header with Magic Card Logo */
        .header {
            background: var(--gradient);
            color: white;
            padding: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .logo-container {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 15px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .logo {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: bold;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .logo .magic-star {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
        }
        
        .logo .magic-star::after {
            content: '★';
            position: absolute;
            top: -15px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: gold;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.8);
            animation: sparkle 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes sparkle {
            0%, 100% { opacity: 0.8; transform: translateX(-50%) scale(1); }
            50% { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(-50%) scale(1.2); }
        }
        
        .logo .text {
            background: white;
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            text-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }
        
        .tagline {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            opacity: 0.9;
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        
        /* Card Info */
        .card-info {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            padding: 12px 20px;
            border-radius: 50px;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-top: 15px;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }
        
        /* Role Selection */
        .role-selection {
            padding: 30px;
            text-align: center;
        }

            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
            color: var(--primary-color);
        }
        
        .role-cards {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 20px;
        }

            .role-cards {
                flex-direction: row;
                justify-content: center;
            }
        }
        
        .role-card {
            background: white;
            border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 250px;
            box-shadow: var(--card-shadow);
        }
        
        .role-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }
        
        .role-card.active {
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1) 0%, rgba(118, 75, 162, 0.1) 100%);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.2);
        }

            font-size: 48px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            height: 80px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .role-icon.receiver { color: var(--success); }

            font-size: 1.4rem;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: var(--dark-text);
        }

            color: var(--light-text);
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }

        .content-section {

            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

            display: block;
        }
