<body>
    <div class="container">
        <!-- Header with Magic Card Logo -->
        <div class="header">
            <div class="logo-container">
                <div class="logo">
                    <span class="text">
                        MAG<span class="magic-star">I</span>C CARD
                    </span>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="tagline">Scan the QR code, then choose your role below</div>
            <div class="card-info" id="cardIdDisplay">
                <i class="fas fa-qrcode"></i> Card: Loading...
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Initial Role Selection -->
        <div class="role-selection" id="roleSelection">
            <h2 class="role-title">Are you the Sender or Receiver?</h2>
            <div class="role-cards">
                <!-- Sender Card -->
                <div class="role-card" onclick="selectRole('sender')" id="senderCard">
                    <div class="role-icon sender">
                        <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3>I'm the Sender</h3>
                    <p>Upload a magical message (text, image, video, or audio) to this card</p>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Receiver Card -->
                <div class="role-card" onclick="selectRole('receiver')" id="receiverCard">
                    <div class="role-icon receiver">
                        <i class="fas fa-gift"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3>I'm the Receiver</h3>
                    <p>View the magical message sent to this card, experience it in AR</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="instructions" style="margin-top: 30px;">
                <h4><i class="fas fa-info-circle"></i> How it Works:</h4>
                <ol>
                    <li><strong>Sender</strong>: Uploads message to the card</li>
                    <li><strong>Receiver</strong>: Scans same QR code to view message</li>
                    <li><strong>Magic</strong>: Experience messages in Augmented Reality!</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- SENDER SECTION (Hidden by default) -->
        <div class="content-section" id="senderSection">
            <button class="back-button" onclick="goBackToRoles()">
                <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i> Back to Role Selection
            </button>
            
            <h2 class="section-title">
                <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i> Upload Magical Message
            </h2>
            <p>You're uploading a message to this card. The receiver will see it when they scan the same QR code.</p>
            
            <!-- Loading State -->
            <div class="loading" id="senderLoading">
                <div class="spinner"></div>
                <p>Checking for existing messages...</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Upload Form (shown when no message exists) -->
            <div id="uploadForm" style="display: none;">
                <!-- Message Type Selection -->
                <div class="message-type-selector">
                    <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('text')" data-type="text">
                        <i class="fas fa-font"></i>
                        <div>Text</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('image')" data-type="image">
                        <i class="fas fa-image"></i>
                        <div>Image</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('video')" data-type="video">
                        <i class="fas fa-video"></i>
                        <div>Video</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('audio')" data-type="audio">
                        <i class="fas fa-music"></i>
                        <div>Audio</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Text Input -->
                <div id="textInputSection">
                    <label>Your Magical Message:</label>
                    <textarea id="messageText" placeholder="Type your heartfelt message here..." 
                              rows="4" oninput="updatePreview()"></textarea>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Media Upload -->
                <div id="mediaUploadSection" style="display: none;">
                    <label>Upload File:</label>
                    <div class="file-upload-area" onclick="document.getElementById('fileInput').click()">
                        <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i>
                        <h3>Click to Upload</h3>
                        <p>Images, Videos, or Audio files</p>
                        <p><small>Max 50MB</small></p>
                    </div>
                    <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept="image/*,video/*,audio/*" 
                           style="display: none;" onchange="handleFileUpload(this.files[0])">
                    <div id="mediaPreview"></div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Message Preview -->
                <div class="preview-area">
                    <div class="preview-title">
                        <i class="fas fa-eye"></i> Message Preview
                    </div>
                    <div id="messagePreview">
                        <div class="empty-message">
                            Your message preview will appear here
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Upload Button -->
                <div class="button-group">
                    <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="uploadMessage()" id="uploadBtn">
                        <i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Message Already Exists -->
            <div id="messageExistsSection" style="display: none;">
                <div class="message-display">
                    <h3>🎉 Message Already Uploaded!</h3>
                    <p>This card already has a message from the sender.</p>
                    <div class="preview-area" id="existingMessagePreview">
                        Loading message...
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="instructions">
                    <h4><i class="fas fa-lightbulb"></i> Options:</h4>
                    <p>You can replace the existing message or delete it to start fresh.</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="button-group">
                    <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="replaceMessage()">
                        <i class="fas fa-sync"></i> Replace Message
                    </button>
                    <button class="btn btn-danger" onclick="deleteMessage()">
                        <i class="fas fa-trash"></i> Delete Message
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- RECEIVER SECTION (Hidden by default) -->
        <div class="content-section" id="receiverSection">
            <button class="back-button" onclick="goBackToRoles()">
                <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i> Back to Role Selection
            </button>
            
            <h2 class="section-title">
                <i class="fas fa-gift"></i> View Magical Message
            </h2>
            <p>You're viewing a message sent to this card. Experience it in Augmented Reality!</p>
            
            <!-- Loading State -->
            <div class="loading" id="receiverLoading">
                <div class="spinner"></div>
                <p>Loading message...</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Message Display -->
            <div id="receiverContent" style="display: none;">
                <div class="tab-container">
                    <div class="tab active" onclick="showReceiverTab('view')">View Message</div>
                    <div class="tab" onclick="showReceiverTab('ar')">AR Experience</div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- View Tab -->
                <div id="viewTab">
                    <div class="message-display" id="receiverMessage">
                        <!-- Message will be displayed here -->
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="button-group">
                        <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="viewInAR()" id="arBtn" disabled>
                            <i class="fas fa-vr-cardboard"></i> View in AR
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="shareMessage()" id="shareBtn" disabled>
                            <i class="fas fa-share-alt"></i> Share Message
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- AR Tab -->
                <div id="arTab" style="display: none;">
                    <div class="ar-qr-code" id="arQrCode">
                        <!-- AR QR code will be generated here -->
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="instructions">
                        <h4><i class="fas fa-camera"></i> How to View in AR:</h4>
                        <ol>
                            <li>Scan the QR code above with your phone's camera</li>
                            <li>Point your camera at a flat surface</li>
                            <li>The message will appear in augmented reality!</li>
                        </ol>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="button-group">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="startAR()">
                            <i class="fas fa-play"></i> Start AR Preview
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="stopAR()">
                            <i class="fas fa-stop"></i> Stop AR
                        </button>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="ar-container" id="arContainer">
                        <!-- A-Frame Scene will be inserted here -->
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- No Message State -->
                <div id="noMessageSection" style="display: none;">
                    <div class="message-display">
                        <div class="empty-message">
                            <i class="fas fa-envelope-open-text" style="font-size: 48px; color: #ccc; margin-bottom: 15px;"></i>
                            <h3>No Message Yet!</h3>
                            <p>The sender hasn't uploaded a message to this card yet.</p>
                            <p style="margin-top: 15px;">Please ask the sender to scan the QR code and upload a message.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="instructions">
                        <h4><i class="fas fa-question-circle"></i> What to do:</h4>
                        <p>If you're supposed to receive a message, ask the sender to:</p>
                        <ol>
                            <li>Scan the same QR code you scanned</li>
                            <li>Select "I'm the Sender"</li>
                            <li>Upload their magical message</li>
                        </ol>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Status Messages -->
        <div class="status" id="statusMessage"></div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Firebase Configuration
        const firebaseConfig = {
            apiKey: "AIzaSyB2KubmablXwpbSpMT8RCba_Na-7XnpuKY",
            authDomain: "magic-card-business.firebaseapp.com",
            projectId: "magic-card-business",
            storageBucket: "magic-card-business.firebasestorage.app",
            messagingSenderId: "837403328170",
            appId: "1:837403328170:web:3d768122e4d03b98905ad3"
        };
        
        // Initialize Firebase
        let db, storage;
        try {
            firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);
            db = firebase.firestore();
            storage = firebase.storage();
            console.log("Firebase initialized");
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Firebase error:", error);
        }
        
        // Global Variables
        let currentCardId = '';
        let currentMessage = null;
        let uploadedFile = null;
        let selectedMessageType = 'text';
        let currentRole = null;
        let arActive = false;
        
        // DOM Elements
        const roleSelection = document.getElementById('roleSelection');
        const senderSection = document.getElementById('senderSection');
        const receiverSection = document.getElementById('receiverSection');
        const senderCard = document.getElementById('senderCard');
        const receiverCard = document.getElementById('receiverCard');
        const cardIdDisplay = document.getElementById('cardIdDisplay');
        
        // Initialize on load
        window.onload = async function() {
            // Get card ID from URL
            const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
            currentCardId = urlParams.get('card') || 'DEMO-CARD-001';
            
            // Display card ID
            cardIdDisplay.innerHTML = `<i class="fas fa-qrcode"></i> Card: ${currentCardId}`;
            
            // Check for existing message in background
            await checkForMessage();
        };
        
        // Select Role (Sender or Receiver)
        function selectRole(role) {
            currentRole = role;
            
            // Update UI
            senderCard.classList.remove('active');
            receiverCard.classList.remove('active');
            
            if (role === 'sender') {
                senderCard.classList.add('active');
                roleSelection.style.display = 'none';
                senderSection.classList.add('active');
                loadSenderSection();
            } else {
                receiverCard.classList.add('active');
                roleSelection.style.display = 'none';
                receiverSection.classList.add('active');
                loadReceiverSection();
            }
        }
        
        // Go back to role selection
        function goBackToRoles() {
            senderSection.classList.remove('active');
            receiverSection.classList.remove('active');
            roleSelection.style.display = 'block';
            currentRole = null;
        }
        
        // Check Firebase for existing message
        async function checkForMessage() {
            if (!db) {
                console.log("No Firebase connection");
                return null;
            }
            
            try {
                const docRef = db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId);
                const doc = await docRef.get();
                
                if (doc.exists) {
                    currentMessage = doc.data();
                    return currentMessage;
                }
                return null;
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Error checking message:', error);
                return null;
            }
        }
        
        // Load sender section
        async function loadSenderSection() {
            const senderLoading = document.getElementById('senderLoading');
            const uploadForm = document.getElementById('uploadForm');
            const messageExistsSection = document.getElementById('messageExistsSection');
            
            // Show loading
            senderLoading.style.display = 'block';
            uploadForm.style.display = 'none';
            messageExistsSection.style.display = 'none';
            
            // Check for existing message
            await checkForMessage();
            
            // Hide loading
            senderLoading.style.display = 'none';
            
            if (currentMessage) {
                // Show existing message
                messageExistsSection.style.display = 'block';
                displayExistingMessage();
            } else {
                // Show upload form
                uploadForm.style.display = 'block';
                selectMessageType('text');
            }
        }
        
        // Display existing message in sender section
        function displayExistingMessage() {
            const existingMessagePreview = document.getElementById('existingMessagePreview');
            
            let previewHTML = '<div style="padding: 15px;">';
            previewHTML += `<h4 style="margin-bottom: 15px; color: var(--primary-color);">
                <i class="fas fa-envelope"></i> Current Message
            </h4>`;
            
            if (currentMessage.type === 'text') {
                previewHTML += `<div style="background: white; padding: 15px; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--primary-color);">
                    ${currentMessage.message || 'Text message'}
                </div>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'image') {
                previewHTML += `<img src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 150px; border-radius: 8px; display: block; margin: 0 auto;">`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'video') {
                previewHTML += `<p><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video message uploaded</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'audio') {
                previewHTML += `<p><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio message uploaded</p>`;
            }
            
            if (currentMessage.createdAt) {
                const date = new Date(currentMessage.createdAt);
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; font-size: 0.9rem; color: var(--light-text);">
                    <i class="far fa-clock"></i> Uploaded: ${date.toLocaleDateString()}
                </p>`;
            }
            
            previewHTML += '</div>';
            existingMessagePreview.innerHTML = previewHTML;
        }
        
        // Load receiver section
        async function loadReceiverSection() {
            const receiverLoading = document.getElementById('receiverLoading');
            const receiverContent = document.getElementById('receiverContent');
            const noMessageSection = document.getElementById('noMessageSection');
            
            // Show loading
            receiverLoading.style.display = 'block';
            receiverContent.style.display = 'none';
            noMessageSection.style.display = 'none';
            
            // Check for message
            await checkForMessage();
            
            // Hide loading
            receiverLoading.style.display = 'none';
            receiverContent.style.display = 'block';
            
            if (currentMessage) {
                // Show message
                noMessageSection.style.display = 'none';
                displayReceiverMessage();
                showReceiverTab('view');
                
                // Enable buttons
                document.getElementById('arBtn').disabled = false;
                document.getElementById('shareBtn').disabled = false;
            } else {
                // Show no message state
                noMessageSection.style.display = 'block';
                document.getElementById('viewTab').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('arTab').style.display = 'none';
            }
        }
        
        // Display message in receiver section
        function displayReceiverMessage() {
            const receiverMessage = document.getElementById('receiverMessage');
            
            let messageHTML = '<div style="text-align: left;">';
            messageHTML += `<h3 style="color: var(--primary-color); margin-bottom: 20px; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px;">
                <i class="fas fa-magic"></i> Your Magical Message
            </h3>`;
            
            if (currentMessage.type === 'text') {
                messageHTML += `<div style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6; padding: 20px; background: white; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);">
                    ${currentMessage.message.replace(/\n/g, '<br>')}
                </div>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'image') {
                messageHTML += `<div style="text-align: center;">
                    <img src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 250px; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);">
                    <p style="margin-top: 15px; color: var(--light-text);"><i class="fas fa-image"></i> Image Message</p>
                </div>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'video') {
                messageHTML += `<div style="text-align: center;">
                    <video controls style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 250px; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);">
                        <source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}">
                    </video>
                    <p style="margin-top: 15px; color: var(--light-text);"><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video Message</p>
                </div>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'audio') {
                messageHTML += `<div style="text-align: center;">
                    <audio controls style="width: 100%;">
                        <source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}">
                    </audio>
                    <p style="margin-top: 15px; color: var(--light-text);"><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio Message</p>
                </div>`;
            }
            
            if (currentMessage.createdAt) {
                const date = new Date(currentMessage.createdAt);
                messageHTML += `<div style="margin-top: 20px; padding-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid #e2e8f0; color: var(--light-text);">
                    <i class="far fa-clock"></i> Received on ${date.toLocaleDateString()} at ${date.toLocaleTimeString()}
                </div>`;
            }
            
            messageHTML += '</div>';
            receiverMessage.innerHTML = messageHTML;
        }
        
        // SENDER FUNCTIONS
        
        function selectMessageType(type) {
            selectedMessageType = type;
            
            // Update UI
            document.querySelectorAll('.type-option').forEach(option => {
                option.classList.remove('selected');
            });
            document.querySelector(`.type-option[data-type="${type}"]`).classList.add('selected');
            
            // Show/hide appropriate sections
            const textInputSection = document.getElementById('textInputSection');
            const mediaUploadSection = document.getElementById('mediaUploadSection');
            
            if (type === 'text') {
                textInputSection.style.display = 'block';
                mediaUploadSection.style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('messageText').focus();
            } else {
                textInputSection.style.display = 'none';
                mediaUploadSection.style.display = 'block';
            }
            
            // Clear preview
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        function handleFileUpload(file) {
            if (!file) return;
            
            // Check file size (50MB limit)
            if (file.size > 50 * 1024 * 1024) {
                showStatus('File size exceeds 50MB limit', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            uploadedFile = file;
            const mediaPreview = document.getElementById('mediaPreview');
            mediaPreview.innerHTML = '';
            
            const reader = new FileReader();
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                let previewHTML = '';
                
                if (file.type.startsWith('image/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<img src="${e.target.result}" class="media-preview" alt="Preview">`;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('video/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<p><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video file selected</p>`;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('audio/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<p><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio file selected</p>`;
                }
                
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; color: var(--light-text);">
                    <i class="fas fa-file"></i> ${file.name} (${(file.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB)
                </p>`;
                
                mediaPreview.innerHTML = previewHTML;
            };
            
            reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        function updatePreview() {
            const messagePreview = document.getElementById('messagePreview');
            
            if (selectedMessageType === 'text') {
                const text = document.getElementById('messageText').value;
                if (text.trim()) {
                    messagePreview.innerHTML = `<div class="preview-content">${text.replace(/\n/g, '<br>')}</div>`;
                } else {
                    messagePreview.innerHTML = `<div class="empty-message">Type your message above to see preview</div>`;
                }
            } else if (uploadedFile) {
                messagePreview.innerHTML = `<div class="preview-content">
                    <p><i class="fas fa-file-upload"></i> Ready to upload:</p>
                    <p><strong>${uploadedFile.name}</strong></p>
                    <p>Size: ${(uploadedFile.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB</p>
                </div>`;
            } else {
                messagePreview.innerHTML = `<div class="empty-message">Select a file to upload</div>`;
            }
        }
        
        async function uploadMessage() {
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('No internet connection. Cannot upload.', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            const uploadBtn = document.getElementById('uploadBtn');
            uploadBtn.disabled = true;
            uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> Uploading...';
            
            let messageData = {
                cardId: currentCardId,
                type: selectedMessageType,
                createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
                status: 'active'
            };
            
            try {
                if (selectedMessageType === 'text') {
                    const text = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim();
                    if (!text) {
                        showStatus('Please enter a message', 'error');
                        uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                        uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message';
                        return;
                    }
                    messageData.message = text;
                    
                } else {
                    if (!uploadedFile) {
                        showStatus('Please select a file to upload', 'error');
                        uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                        uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message';
                        return;
                    }
                    
                    showStatus('Uploading file...', 'warning');
                    
                    const storageRef = storage.ref();
                    const fileName = `${currentCardId}_${Date.now()}_${uploadedFile.name.replace(/\s+/g, '_')}`;
                    const fileRef = storageRef.child(`cards/${currentCardId}/${fileName}`);
                    
                    const snapshot = await fileRef.put(uploadedFile);
                    const downloadURL = await snapshot.ref.getDownloadURL();
                    
                    messageData.mediaUrl = downloadURL;
                    messageData.fileName = uploadedFile.name;
                    messageData.fileSize = uploadedFile.size;
                    messageData.fileType = uploadedFile.type;
                }
                
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).set(messageData);
                
                currentMessage = messageData;
                document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('messageExistsSection').style.display = 'block';
                displayExistingMessage();
                
                showStatus('Message uploaded successfully! ✨', 'success');
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                    uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message';
                }, 1000);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Upload error:', error);
                showStatus('Upload failed. Please try again.', 'error');
                uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Upload Message';
            }
        }
        
        function replaceMessage() {
            document.getElementById('messageExistsSection').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'block';
            
            document.getElementById('messageText').value = '';
            document.getElementById('mediaPreview').innerHTML = '';
            uploadedFile = null;
            selectMessageType('text');
        }
        
        async function deleteMessage() {
            if (!confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this message? This cannot be undone.')) return;
            
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('No internet connection', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).delete();
                
                if (currentMessage.mediaUrl) {
                    try {
                        const fileRef = storage.refFromURL(currentMessage.mediaUrl);
                        await fileRef.delete();
                    } catch (storageError) {
                        console.log('Could not delete file from storage:', storageError);
                    }
                }
                
                currentMessage = null;
                document.getElementById('messageExistsSection').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'block';
                
                showStatus('Message deleted successfully', 'success');
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Delete error:', error);
                showStatus('Failed to delete message', 'error');
            }
        }
        
        // RECEIVER FUNCTIONS
        
        function showReceiverTab(tab) {
            document.getElementById('viewTab').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('arTab').style.display = 'none';
            document.querySelectorAll('.tab').forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
            
            if (tab === 'view') {
                document.getElementById('viewTab').style.display = 'block';
                document.querySelector('.tab:nth-child(1)').classList.add('active');
            } else {
                document.getElementById('arTab').style.display = 'block';
                document.querySelector('.tab:nth-child(2)').classList.add('active');
                generateARQRCode();
            }
        }
        
        function viewInAR() {
            showReceiverTab('ar');
        }
        
        function generateARQRCode() {
            const arQrDiv = document.getElementById('arQrCode');
            arQrDiv.innerHTML = '';
            
            // Create canvas for QR code
            const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            canvas.width = 200;
            canvas.height = 200;
            
            // Draw QR code (simplified for demo)
            ctx.fillStyle = 'white';
            ctx.fillRect(0, 0, 200, 200);
            
            // Draw QR pattern
            ctx.fillStyle = 'black';
            
            // Position markers
            ctx.fillRect(20, 20, 40, 40);
            ctx.fillRect(140, 20, 40, 40);
            ctx.fillRect(20, 140, 40, 40);
            
            // Center pattern
            ctx.fillRect(80, 80, 40, 40);
            
            arQrDiv.appendChild(canvas);
            
            arQrDiv.innerHTML += `
                <p style="margin-top: 15px; color: var(--light-text);">
                    <i class="fas fa-camera"></i> Scan this code with your phone's camera
                </p>
                <p style="font-size: 0.9rem; color: var(--light-text);">
                    Point camera at a flat surface to see the message in AR
                </p>
            `;
        }
        
        function startAR() {
            const arContainer = document.getElementById('arContainer');
            arActive = true;
            arContainer.style.display = 'block';
            
            // Simple AR scene for demo
            arContainer.innerHTML = `
                <div style="width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; color: white; background: linear-gradient(45deg, #1a1a1a, #2d2d2d);">
                    <div style="text-align: center; padding: 20px;">
                        <div style="font-size: 48px; margin-bottom: 20px;">
                            ${currentMessage.type === 'text' ? '📜' : 
                              currentMessage.type === 'image' ? '🖼️' :
                              currentMessage.type === 'video' ? '🎥' : '🎵'}
                        </div>
                        <h3 style="margin-bottom: 15px;">AR Preview</h3>
                        <p>In a real AR app, your message would appear here</p>
                        <p style="margin-top: 20px; font-size: 0.9rem; opacity: 0.8;">
                            Scan the QR code with your AR app for full experience
                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `;
            
            showStatus('AR preview started. Scan QR code for full AR experience.', 'success');
        }
        
        function stopAR() {
            const arContainer = document.getElementById('arContainer');
            arActive = false;
            arContainer.style.display = 'none';
            arContainer.innerHTML = '';
        }
        
        function shareMessage() {
            if (!currentMessage) return;
            
            const shareUrl = window.location.href;
            const shareText = `I received a magical message! Check it out: ${shareUrl}`;
            
            if (navigator.share) {
                navigator.share({
                    title: 'Magic Card Message',
                    text: shareText,
                    url: shareUrl
                });
            } else {
                navigator.clipboard.writeText(shareUrl).then(() => {
                    showStatus('Link copied to clipboard!', 'success');
                });
            }
        }
        
        // Utility function
        function showStatus(message, type) {
            const statusDiv = document.getElementById('statusMessage');
            statusDiv.textContent = message;
            statusDiv.className = `status ${type}`;
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                statusDiv.className = 'status';
            }, 5000);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

🎯 Key Improvements:

1. Clean Role Selection First:

  • Two prominent cards: "I'm the Sender" and "I'm the Receiver"

  • Clear visual distinction with different colors and icons

  • Hover effects and animations for better UX

  • Instructions below to guide users

2. Drop-Down Style Sections:

  • Click Sender card → Expands into full sender interface

  • Click Receiver card → Expands into full receiver interface

  • Back button to return to role selection

  • Smooth animations when transitioning

3. Sender Section Features:

  • Message type selection (text, image, video, audio)

  • Live preview of what will be uploaded

  • File upload with size validation

  • Existing message management (replace/delete)

4. Receiver Section Features:

  • Two-tab interface (View Message / AR Experience)

  • Beautiful message display with formatting

  • AR QR code generation for augmented reality

  • Share functionality to spread the magic

  • No-message state with clear instructions

5. User Flow:

  1. Scan QR code → Lands on role selection page

  2. Choose "Sender" → Upload message interface appears

  3. Choose "Receiver" → View message interface appears

  4. Seamless switching between roles with back button

The interface is now much cleaner and more intuitive for users who might be confused about whether they're the sender or receiver of the card! ✨

i like this but take the logo from this code <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Magic Card - Upload</title> <style> body { font-family: Arial; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); } .card-id { background: #667eea; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 20px; display: inline-block; margin: 20px 0; } .message-box { background: #f8f9fa; padding: 20px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0; min-height: 100px; border: 2px dashed #667eea; } textarea { width: 100%; height: 150px; padding: 15px; border: 2px solid #667eea; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 20px; } button { background: #667eea; color: white; border: none; padding: 15px 30px; font-size: 18px; border-radius: 10px; cursor: pointer; margin: 10px; } .success { background: #28a745; } .error { background: #dc3545; color: white; padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0; } </style> <!-- FIREBASE --> <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-app.js"></script> <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-firestore.js"></script> <script> const firebaseConfig = { apiKey: "AIzaSyB2KubmablXwpbSpMT8RCba_Na-7XnpuKY", authDomain: "magic-card-business.firebaseapp.com", projectId: "magic-card-business", storageBucket: "magic-card-business.firebasestorage.app", messagingSenderId: "837403328170", appId: "1:837403328170:web:3d768122e4d03b98905ad3" };
