        .tab-container {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .tab {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 12px;
            text-align: center;
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            border: 2px solid #34495E;
            border-radius: 8px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: bold;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            color: white;
        }
        
        .tab:hover {
            border-color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        .tab.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #FFD700 0%, #FFA500 100%);
            color: #333;
            border-color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        /* Status Messages */
        .status {
            padding: 15px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            margin: 15px 0;
            display: none;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        
        .success { 
            background: rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.2); 
            color: #27AE60; 
            border: 1px solid #27AE60; 
            display: block;
        }
        
        .error { 
            background: rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.2); 
            color: #E74C3C; 
            border: 1px solid #E74C3C; 
            display: block;
        }
        
        .warning { 
            background: rgba(243, 156, 18, 0.2); 
            color: #F39C12; 
            border: 1px solid #F39C12; 
            display: block;
        }
        
        /* Instructions */
        .instructions {
            margin-top: 30px;
            padding: 20px;
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            border-radius: 10px;
            border: 1px solid #34495E;
        }
        
        .instructions h3 {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            color: #FFD700;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .instructions p {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            line-height: 1.5;
            color: #AAAAAA;
        }
        
        .instructions ol {
            padding-left: 20px;
            color: #AAAAAA;
        }
        
        .instructions li {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        
        /* Connection Status */
        .connection-status {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #27AE60;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        
        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            body {
                padding: 10px;
            }
            
            #company-logo {
                font-size: 28px;
                margin-top: 10px;
            }
            
            .role-cards {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
            
            .role-card {
                min-width: 100%;
            }
            
            .message-type-selector {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .button-group {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
            
            .btn {
                width: 100%;
                margin: 5px 0;
            }
            
            .tab-container {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- YOUR BEAUTIFUL LOGO -->
    <div id="company-logo">
        MAG<span class="magic-i">I</span>C CARD
    </div>
    
    <!-- Card ID Display -->
    <div class="card-id-display" id="cardIdDisplay">
        <i class="fas fa-qrcode"></i> Card: Loading...
    </div>
    
    <!-- Connection Status -->
    <div class="connection-status" id="connectionStatus"></div>
    
    <!-- Initial Role Selection -->
    <div class="role-selection" id="roleSelection">
        <h2 class="role-title">Are you the Sender or Receiver?</h2>
        <div class="role-cards">
            <!-- Sender Card -->
            <div class="role-card" onclick="selectRole('sender')" id="senderCard">
                <div class="role-icon sender">
                    <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i>
                </div>
                <h3>I'm the Sender</h3>
                <p>Upload a magical message (text, image, video, or audio) to this card</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Receiver Card -->
            <div class="role-card" onclick="selectRole('receiver')" id="receiverCard">
                <div class="role-icon receiver">
                    <i class="fas fa-gift"></i>
                </div>
                <h3>I'm the Receiver</h3>
                <p>View the magical message sent to this card, experience it in AR</p>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <div class="instructions">
            <h3><i class="fas fa-star"></i> How This Works</h3>
            <ol>
                <li><strong>Sender</strong> scans QR → Uploads message</li>
                <li><strong>Receiver</strong> scans same QR → Views message</li>
                <li>Message appears in Augmented Reality! ✨</li>
            </ol>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- SENDER SECTION (Hidden by default) -->
    <div class="content-section" id="senderSection">
        <button class="back-button" onclick="goBackToRoles()">
            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i> Back to Role Selection
        </button>
        
        <h2 class="section-title"><i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i> Upload Magical Message</h2>
        <p style="text-align: center; color: #AAAAAA; margin-bottom: 20px;">You're uploading a message to this card. The receiver will see it when they scan the same QR code.</p>
        
        <!-- Loading State -->
        <div class="loading" id="senderLoading">
            <div class="spinner"></div>
            <p>Checking for existing messages...</p>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Upload Form (shown when no message exists) -->
        <div id="uploadForm" style="display: none;">
            <!-- Message Type Selection -->
            <div class="message-type-selector">
                <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('text')" data-type="text">
                    <i class="fas fa-font"></i>
                    <div>Text</div>
                </div>
                <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('image')" data-type="image">
                    <i class="fas fa-image"></i>
                    <div>Image</div>
                </div>
                <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('video')" data-type="video">
                    <i class="fas fa-video"></i>
                    <div>Video</div>
                </div>
                <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('audio')" data-type="audio">
                    <i class="fas fa-music"></i>
                    <div>Audio</div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Text Input -->
            <div id="textInputSection">
                <label style="color: #FFD700; font-weight: bold; display: block; margin-bottom: 8px;">Your Magical Message:</label>
                <textarea id="messageText" placeholder="Type your heartfelt message here..." 
                          oninput="updatePreview()"></textarea>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Media Upload -->
            <div id="mediaUploadSection" style="display: none;">
                <label style="color: #FFD700; font-weight: bold; display: block; margin-bottom: 8px;">Upload File:</label>
                <div class="file-upload-area" onclick="document.getElementById('fileInput').click()">
                    <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i>
                    <h3>Click to Upload</h3>
                    <p>Images, Videos, or Audio files</p>
                    <p><small>Max 50MB</small></p>
                </div>
                <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept="image/*,video/*,audio/*" 
                       style="display: none;" onchange="handleFileUpload(this.files[0])">
                <div id="mediaPreview"></div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Message Preview -->
            <div class="preview-area">
                <label style="color: #FFD700; font-weight: bold; display: block; margin-bottom: 8px;">
                    <i class="fas fa-eye"></i> Message Preview:
                </label>
                <div class="preview-content" id="messagePreview">
                    Your message preview will appear here
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Upload Button -->
            <div class="button-group">
                <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="uploadMessage()" id="uploadBtn">
                    <i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Message Already Exists -->
        <div id="messageExistsSection" style="display: none;">
            <div class="message-box">
                <h3 style="color: #FFD700; margin-bottom: 15px;"><i class="fas fa-gift"></i> Message Already Uploaded!</h3>
                <p style="color: #AAAAAA; margin-bottom: 15px;">This card already has a message from the sender.</p>
                <div class="preview-content" id="existingMessagePreview">
                    Loading message...
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="button-group">
                <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="replaceMessage()">
                    <i class="fas fa-sync"></i> REPLACE MESSAGE
                </button>
                <button class="btn btn-danger" onclick="deleteMessage()">
                    <i class="fas fa-trash"></i> DELETE MESSAGE
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- RECEIVER SECTION (Hidden by default) -->
    <div class="content-section" id="receiverSection">
        <button class="back-button" onclick="goBackToRoles()">
            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i> Back to Role Selection
        </button>
        
        <h2 class="section-title"><i class="fas fa-gift"></i> View Magical Message</h2>
        <p style="text-align: center; color: #AAAAAA; margin-bottom: 20px;">You're viewing a message sent to this card. Experience it in Augmented Reality!</p>
        
        <!-- Loading State -->
        <div class="loading" id="receiverLoading">
            <div class="spinner"></div>
            <p>Loading message...</p>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Message Display -->
        <div id="receiverContent" style="display: none;">
            <div class="tab-container">
                <div class="tab active" onclick="showReceiverTab('view')">View Message</div>
                <div class="tab" onclick="showReceiverTab('ar')">AR Experience</div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- View Tab -->
            <div id="viewTab">
                <div class="message-box" id="receiverMessage">
                    <!-- Message will be displayed here -->
                </div>
                
                <div class="button-group">
                    <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="viewInAR()" id="arBtn" disabled>
                        <i class="fas fa-vr-cardboard"></i> VIEW IN AR
                    </button>
                    <button class="btn btn-purple" onclick="shareMessage()" id="shareBtn" disabled>
                        <i class="fas fa-share-alt"></i> SHARE
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- AR Tab -->
            <div id="arTab" style="display: none;">
                <div class="instructions" style="text-align: center;">
                    <h3><i class="fas fa-camera"></i> How to View in AR</h3>
                    <p>Scan this card's QR code with the AR viewer to see the message in augmented reality!</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="button-group">
                    <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="openARViewer()">
                        <i class="fas fa-external-link-alt"></i> OPEN AR VIEWER
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- No Message State -->
            <div id="noMessageSection" style="display: none;">
                <div class="message-box">
                    <h3 style="color: #FFD700; margin-bottom: 15px;"><i class="fas fa-envelope-open-text"></i> No Message Yet!</h3>
                    <p style="color: #AAAAAA; margin-bottom: 15px;">The sender hasn't uploaded a message to this card yet.</p>
                    <p style="color: #AAAAAA;">Please ask the sender to scan the QR code and upload a message.</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="instructions">
                    <h3><i class="fas fa-question-circle"></i> What to do:</h3>
                    <p style="color: #FFD700; margin-bottom: 10px;">If you're supposed to receive a message, ask the sender to:</p>
                    <ol>
                        <li>Scan the same QR code you scanned</li>
                        <li>Select "I'm the Sender"</li>
                        <li>Upload their magical message</li>
                    </ol>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Status Messages -->
    <div class="status" id="statusMessage"></div>

    <script>
        // Firebase Configuration
        const firebaseConfig = {
            apiKey: "AIzaSyB2KubmablXwpbSpMT8RCba_Na-7XnpuKY",
            authDomain: "magic-card-business.firebaseapp.com",
            projectId: "magic-card-business",
            storageBucket: "magic-card-business.firebasestorage.app",
            messagingSenderId: "837403328170",
            appId: "1:837403328170:web:3d768122e4d03b98905ad3"
        };
        
        // Initialize Firebase
        let db, storage;
        try {
            firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);
            db = firebase.firestore();
            storage = firebase.storage();
            console.log("Firebase initialized");
            document.getElementById('connectionStatus').textContent = "✅ Connected to cloud";
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Firebase error:", error);
            document.getElementById('connectionStatus').textContent = "⚠️ Working offline";
            document.getElementById('connectionStatus').style.color = "#F39C12";
        }
        
        // Global Variables
        let currentCardId = '';
        let currentMessage = null;
        let uploadedFile = null;
        let selectedMessageType = 'text';
        let currentRole = null;
        
        // DOM Elements
        const roleSelection = document.getElementById('roleSelection');
        const senderSection = document.getElementById('senderSection');
        const receiverSection = document.getElementById('receiverSection');
        const senderCard = document.getElementById('senderCard');
        const receiverCard = document.getElementById('receiverCard');
        const cardIdDisplay = document.getElementById('cardIdDisplay');
        
        // Initialize on load
        window.onload = async function() {
            // Get card ID from URL
            const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
            currentCardId = urlParams.get('card') || 'DEMO-CARD';
            
            // Display card ID
            cardIdDisplay.innerHTML = `<i class="fas fa-qrcode"></i> Card: ${currentCardId}`;
            
            // Check for existing message in background
            await checkForMessage();
        };
        
        // Select Role (Sender or Receiver)
        function selectRole(role) {
            currentRole = role;
            
            // Update UI
            senderCard.classList.remove('active');
            receiverCard.classList.remove('active');
            
            if (role === 'sender') {
                senderCard.classList.add('active');
                roleSelection.style.display = 'none';
                senderSection.classList.add('active');
                loadSenderSection();
            } else {
                receiverCard.classList.add('active');
                roleSelection.style.display = 'none';
                receiverSection.classList.add('active');
                loadReceiverSection();
            }
        }
        
        // Go back to role selection
        function goBackToRoles() {
            senderSection.classList.remove('active');
            receiverSection.classList.remove('active');
            roleSelection.style.display = 'block';
            currentRole = null;
        }
        
        // Check Firebase for existing message
        async function checkForMessage() {
            if (!db) {
                console.log("No Firebase connection");
                return null;
            }
            
            try {
                const docRef = db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId);
                const doc = await docRef.get();
                
                if (doc.exists) {
                    currentMessage = doc.data();
                    return currentMessage;
                }
                return null;
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Error checking message:', error);
                return null;
            }
        }
        
        // Load sender section
        async function loadSenderSection() {
            const senderLoading = document.getElementById('senderLoading');
            const uploadForm = document.getElementById('uploadForm');
            const messageExistsSection = document.getElementById('messageExistsSection');
            
            // Show loading
            senderLoading.style.display = 'block';
            uploadForm.style.display = 'none';
            messageExistsSection.style.display = 'none';
            
            // Check for existing message
            await checkForMessage();
            
            // Hide loading
            senderLoading.style.display = 'none';
            
            if (currentMessage) {
                // Show existing message
                messageExistsSection.style.display = 'block';
                displayExistingMessage();
            } else {
                // Show upload form
                uploadForm.style.display = 'block';
                selectMessageType('text');
            }
        }
        
        // Display existing message in sender section
        function displayExistingMessage() {
            const existingMessagePreview = document.getElementById('existingMessagePreview');
            
            let previewHTML = '<div style="text-align: center;">';
            
            if (currentMessage.type === 'text') {
                previewHTML += `<p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6;">${currentMessage.message || 'Text message'}</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'image') {
                previewHTML += `<img src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" class="media-preview" alt="Uploaded image">`;
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-image"></i> Image Message</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'video') {
                previewHTML += `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video message uploaded</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'audio') {
                previewHTML += `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio message uploaded</p>`;
            }
            
            if (currentMessage.createdAt) {
                const date = new Date(currentMessage.createdAt);
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; font-size: 12px; color: #AAAAAA;">
                    <i class="far fa-clock"></i> Uploaded: ${date.toLocaleDateString()}
                </p>`;
            }
            
            previewHTML += '</div>';
            existingMessagePreview.innerHTML = previewHTML;
        }
        
        // Load receiver section
        async function loadReceiverSection() {
            const receiverLoading = document.getElementById('receiverLoading');
            const receiverContent = document.getElementById('receiverContent');
            const noMessageSection = document.getElementById('noMessageSection');
            
            // Show loading
            receiverLoading.style.display = 'block';
            receiverContent.style.display = 'none';
            noMessageSection.style.display = 'none';
            
            // Check for message
            await checkForMessage();
            
            // Hide loading
            receiverLoading.style.display = 'none';
            receiverContent.style.display = 'block';
            
            if (currentMessage) {
                // Show message
                noMessageSection.style.display = 'none';
                displayReceiverMessage();
                showReceiverTab('view');
                
                // Enable buttons
                document.getElementById('arBtn').disabled = false;
                document.getElementById('shareBtn').disabled = false;
            } else {
                // Show no message state
                noMessageSection.style.display = 'block';
                document.getElementById('viewTab').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('arTab').style.display = 'none';
            }
        }
        
        // Display message in receiver section
        function displayReceiverMessage() {
            const receiverMessage = document.getElementById('receiverMessage');
            
            let messageHTML = '<div style="text-align: center;">';
            messageHTML += `<h3 style="color: #FFD700; margin-bottom: 20px;"><i class="fas fa-magic"></i> Your Magical Message</h3>`;
            
            if (currentMessage.type === 'text') {
                messageHTML += `<div style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6; padding: 15px; background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1); border-radius: 8px; border-left: 3px solid #FFD700;">
                    ${currentMessage.message.replace(/\n/g, '<br>')}
                </div>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'image') {
                messageHTML += `<img src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" class="media-preview" alt="Image message">`;
                messageHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 15px; color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-image"></i> Image Message</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'video') {
                messageHTML += `<video controls class="media-preview">
                    <source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}">
                </video>`;
                messageHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 15px; color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video Message</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'audio') {
                messageHTML += `<audio controls style="width: 100%">
                    <source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}">
                </audio>`;
                messageHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 15px; color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio Message</p>`;
            }
            
            if (currentMessage.createdAt) {
                const date = new Date(currentMessage.createdAt);
                messageHTML += `<div style="margin-top: 20px; padding-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid #34495E; color: #AAAAAA;">
                    <i class="far fa-clock"></i> Received on ${date.toLocaleDateString()} at ${date.toLocaleTimeString()}
                </div>`;
            }
            
            messageHTML += '</div>';
            receiverMessage.innerHTML = messageHTML;
        }
        
        // SENDER FUNCTIONS
        
        function selectMessageType(type) {
            selectedMessageType = type;
            
            // Update UI
            document.querySelectorAll('.type-option').forEach(option => {
                option.classList.remove('selected');
            });
            document.querySelector(`.type-option[data-type="${type}"]`).classList.add('selected');
            
            // Show/hide appropriate sections
            const textInputSection = document.getElementById('textInputSection');
            const mediaUploadSection = document.getElementById('mediaUploadSection');
            
            if (type === 'text') {
                textInputSection.style.display = 'block';
                mediaUploadSection.style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('messageText').focus();
            } else {
                textInputSection.style.display = 'none';
                mediaUploadSection.style.display = 'block';
            }
            
            // Clear preview
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        function handleFileUpload(file) {
            if (!file) return;
            
            // Check file size (50MB limit)
            if (file.size > 50 * 1024 * 1024) {
                showStatus('File size exceeds 50MB limit', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            uploadedFile = file;
            const mediaPreview = document.getElementById('mediaPreview');
            mediaPreview.innerHTML = '';
            
            const reader = new FileReader();
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                let previewHTML = '';
                
                if (file.type.startsWith('image/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<img src="${e.target.result}" class="media-preview" alt="Preview">`;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('video/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video file selected</p>`;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('audio/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio file selected</p>`;
                }
                
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; color: #AAAAAA;">
                    <i class="fas fa-file"></i> ${file.name} (${(file.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB)
                </p>`;
                
                mediaPreview.innerHTML = previewHTML;
            };
            
            reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        function updatePreview() {
            const messagePreview = document.getElementById('messagePreview');
            
            if (selectedMessageType === 'text') {
                const text = document.getElementById('messageText').value;
                if (text.trim()) {
                    messagePreview.textContent = text;
                } else {
                    messagePreview.innerHTML = '<span style="color: #AAAAAA; font-style: italic;">Type your message above to see preview</span>';
                }
            } else if (uploadedFile) {
                messagePreview.innerHTML = `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-file-upload"></i> Ready to upload:</p>
                    <p><strong>${uploadedFile.name}</strong></p>
                    <p style="color: #AAAAAA;">Size: ${(uploadedFile.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB</p>`;
            } else {
                messagePreview.innerHTML = '<span style="color: #AAAAAA; font-style: italic;">Select a file to upload</span>';
            }
        }
        
        async function uploadMessage() {
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('⚠️ No internet connection', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            const uploadBtn = document.getElementById('uploadBtn');
            uploadBtn.disabled = true;
            uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> UPLOADING...';
            
            let messageData = {
                cardId: currentCardId,
                type: selectedMessageType,
                createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
                status: 'active'
            };
            
            try {
                if (selectedMessageType === 'text') {
                    const text = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim();
                    if (!text) {
                        showStatus('Please type a message!', 'error');
                        uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                        uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE';
                        return;
                    }
                    messageData.message = text;
                    
                } else {
                    if (!uploadedFile) {
                        showStatus('Please select a file to upload', 'error');
                        uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                        uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE';
                        return;
                    }
                    
                    showStatus('Uploading file...', 'warning');
                    
                    const storageRef = storage.ref();
                    const fileName = `${currentCardId}_${Date.now()}_${uploadedFile.name.replace(/\s+/g, '_')}`;
                    const fileRef = storageRef.child(`cards/${currentCardId}/${fileName}`);
                    
                    const snapshot = await fileRef.put(uploadedFile);
                    const downloadURL = await snapshot.ref.getDownloadURL();
                    
                    messageData.mediaUrl = downloadURL;
                    messageData.fileName = uploadedFile.name;
                    messageData.fileSize = uploadedFile.size;
                    messageData.fileType = uploadedFile.type;
                }
                
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).set(messageData);
                
                currentMessage = messageData;
                document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('messageExistsSection').style.display = 'block';
                displayExistingMessage();
                
                showStatus('✅ Message saved to cloud! ✨', 'success');
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                    uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE';
                }, 1000);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Upload error:', error);
                showStatus('❌ Save failed. Try again.', 'error');
                uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE';
            }
        }
        
        function replaceMessage() {
            document.getElementById('messageExistsSection').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'block';
            
            document.getElementById('messageText').value = '';
            document.getElementById('mediaPreview').innerHTML = '';
            uploadedFile = null;
            selectMessageType('text');
        }
        
        async function deleteMessage() {
            if (!confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this message?')) return;
            
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('⚠️ No internet - can\'t delete', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).delete();
                
                if (currentMessage.mediaUrl) {
                    try {
                        const fileRef = storage.refFromURL(currentMessage.mediaUrl);
                        await fileRef.delete();
                    } catch (storageError) {
                        console.log('Could not delete file from storage:', storageError);
                    }
                }
                
                currentMessage = null;
                document.getElementById('messageExistsSection').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'block';
                
                showStatus('Message deleted successfully', 'success');
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Delete error:', error);
                showStatus('❌ Failed to delete message', 'error');
            }
        }
        
        // RECEIVER FUNCTIONS
        
        function showReceiverTab(tab) {
            document.getElementById('viewTab').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('arTab').style.display = 'none';
            document.querySelectorAll('.tab').forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
            
            if (tab === 'view') {
                document.getElementById('viewTab').style.display = 'block';
                document.querySelector('.tab:nth-child(1)').classList.add('active');
            } else {
                document.getElementById('arTab').style.display = 'block';
                document.querySelector('.tab:nth-child(2)').classList.add('active');
            }
        }
        
        function viewInAR() {
            showReceiverTab('ar');
        }
        
        function openARViewer() {
            if (currentMessage) {
                let arUrl = `index.html?card=${encodeURIComponent(currentCardId)}`;
                
                if (currentMessage.type === 'text' && currentMessage.message) {
                    arUrl += `&message=${encodeURIComponent(currentMessage.message)}`;
                } else if (currentMessage.mediaUrl) {
                    arUrl += `&message=${encodeURIComponent(currentMessage.mediaUrl)}`;
                }
                
                window.open(arUrl, '_blank');
            }
        }
        
        function shareMessage() {
            if (!currentMessage) return;
            
            const shareUrl = window.location.href;
            const shareText = `Check out this magical message from Magic Card! ${shareUrl}`;
            
            if (navigator.share) {
                navigator.share({
                    title: 'Magic Card',
                    text: shareText,
                    url: shareUrl
                });
            } else {
                navigator.clipboard.writeText(shareUrl).then(() => {
                    showStatus('✅ Link copied to clipboard!', 'success');
                });
            }
        }
        
        // Status function
        function showStatus(message, type) {
            const statusDiv = document.getElementById('statusMessage');
            statusDiv.textContent = message;
            
            if (type === 'success') {
                statusDiv.className = 'status success';
            } else if (type === 'error') {
                statusDiv.className = 'status error';
            } else if (type === 'warning') {
                statusDiv.className = 'status warning';
            } else {
                statusDiv.className = 'status';
            }
            
            statusDiv.style.display = 'block';
            setTimeout(() => {
                statusDiv.style.display = 'none';
            }, 3000);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

🎯 Key Features Applied from Your AR Page:

1. Beautiful Logo with Star:

  • MAGİC CARD with star above the "I"

  • Gold star ★ positioned perfectly

  • Dark background with white text

2. Dark Theme with Gold Accents:

  • Black background (matches your AR page)

  • Gold/amber colors (#FFD700) for highlights

  • Dark blue/gray cards with subtle borders

  • Professional dark theme throughout

3. Matching Card Design:

  • Card ID display with gold badge styling

  • Role cards with hover effects and gold borders

  • Message boxes with dark backgrounds and borders

  • Consistent spacing and typography

4. AR Integration:

  • "Open AR Viewer" button that links to your AR page

  • Proper URL parameters passed to AR page

  • Seamless transition between view and AR

5. Enhanced Visual Elements:

  • Loading spinners with gold color

  • Status messages with color coding

  • Connection status indicator

  • Professional animations and transitions

The page now perfectly matches the aesthetic of your AR page while maintaining all the sender/receiver functionality! ✨

i lke this but now can you center "card demo card" under the magic card logo

I'll center the "Card: DEMO-CARD" text under the Magic Card logo. Here's the updated code with the card ID centered:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, user-scalable=no">
    <title>Magic Card - Upload & View</title>
    
    <!-- Firebase -->
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-app.js"></script>
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-firestore.js"></script>
    <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-storage.js"></script>
    
    <!-- Font Awesome -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    
    <style>
        * { 
            margin: 0; 
            padding: 0; 
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body { 
            background: black; 
            min-height: 100vh;
            font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
            color: white;
            padding: 20px;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }
        
        /* Company Logo - YOUR BEAUTIFUL LOGO */
        #company-logo {
            text-align: center;
            color: white;
            font-size: 32px;
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            padding-top: 10px;
        }
        
        .magic-i {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
            color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        .magic-i::before {
            content: "★";
            position: absolute;
            top: -15px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        /* Card ID Display - CENTERED UNDER LOGO */
        .logo-container {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .card-id-display {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
            color: #FFD700;
            padding: 8px 25px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            display: inline-block;
            margin: 5px auto 20px;
            border: 1px solid #FFD700;
            font-weight: bold;
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 14px;
            max-width: 400px;
            width: auto;
        }
        
        /* Connection Status */
        .connection-status {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #27AE60;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        
        /* Role Selection */
        .role-selection {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .role-title {
            font-size: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
            color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        .role-cards {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 20px;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .role-cards {
                flex-direction: row;
                justify-content: center;
            }
        }
        
        .role-card {
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            border: 2px solid #34495E;
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 280px;
            max-width: 320px;
            backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
        }
        
        .role-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            border-color: #FFD700;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
        }
        
        .role-card.active {
            border-color: #FFD700;
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .role-icon {
            font-size: 48px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            height: 60px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .role-icon.sender { color: #27AE60; }
        .role-icon.receiver { color: #9B59B6; }
        
        .role-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: white;
        }
        
        .role-card p {
            color: #AAAAAA;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        
        /* Content Sections */
        .content-section {
            display: none;
            animation: fadeIn 0.4s ease-out;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; }
            to { opacity: 1; }
        }
        
        .content-section.active {
            display: block;
        }
        
        /* Back Button */
        .back-button {
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            color: #FFD700;
            border: 1px solid #34495E;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            font-size: 14px;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        
        .back-button:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .section-title {
            font-size: 24px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #FFD700;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        /* Loading State */
        .loading {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px;
        }
        
        .spinner {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-top-color: #FFD700;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
        }
        
        @keyframes spin {
            to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        /* Message Box */
        .message-box {
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            padding: 25px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            border: 1px solid #34495E;
        }
        
        /* Message Type Selection */
        .message-type-selector {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 12px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .type-option {
            padding: 15px;
            border: 2px solid #34495E;
            border-radius: 10px;
            text-align: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .type-option:hover {
            border-color: #FFD700;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .type-option.selected {
            border-color: #FFD700;
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
        }
        
        .type-option i {
            font-size: 24px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            display: block;
            color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        /* Form Elements */
        textarea {
            width: 100%;
            height: 150px;
            padding: 15px;
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            border: 2px solid #34495E;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-size: 16px;
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            resize: vertical;
            color: white;
        }
        
        textarea:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        textarea::placeholder {
            color: #AAAAAA;
        }
        
        /* File Upload */
        .file-upload-area {
            border: 2px dashed #FFD700;
            border-radius: 10px;
            padding: 30px 20px;
            text-align: center;
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.05);
            cursor: pointer;
            margin: 15px 0;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        
        .file-upload-area:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            border-color: #FFA500;
        }
        
        .file-upload-area i {
            font-size: 40px;
            color: #FFD700;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .file-upload-area h3 {
            color: #FFD700;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        
        .file-upload-area p {
            color: #AAAAAA;
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        
        /* Preview */
        .preview-area {
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .preview-content {
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            border: 1px solid #34495E;
            min-height: 120px;
            margin-top: 10px;
            font-size: 16px;
            line-height: 1.6;
            white-space: pre-wrap;
            color: white;
        }
        
        .media-preview {
            max-width: 100%;
            max-height: 200px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: block;
            margin: 10px auto;
            border: 1px solid #34495E;
        }
        
        /* Buttons */
        .btn {
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.9);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 15px 30px;
            font-size: 16px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin: 10px;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            font-weight: bold;
            border: 1px solid #34495E;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .btn-primary {
            background: #27AE60;
            border-color: #2ECC71;
        }
        
        .btn-success {
            background: #27AE60;
            border-color: #2ECC71;
        }
        
        .btn-warning {
            background: #F39C12;
            border-color: #F1C40F;
            color: #333;
        }
        
        .btn-danger {
            background: #E74C3C;
            border-color: #C0392B;
        }
        
        .btn-purple {
            background: #9B59B6;
            border-color: #8E44AD;
        }
        
        button:disabled {
            opacity: 0.5;
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none !important;
        }
        
        .button-group {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-top: 20px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        /* Tabs */
        .tab-container {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .tab {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 12px;
            text-align: center;
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            border: 2px solid #34495E;
            border-radius: 8px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: bold;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            color: white;
        }
        
        .tab:hover {
            border-color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        .tab.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #FFD700 0%, #FFA500 100%);
            color: #333;
            border-color: #FFD700;
        }
        
        /* Status Messages */
        .status {
            padding: 15px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            margin: 15px 0;
            display: none;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        
        .success { 
            background: rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.2); 
            color: #27AE60; 
            border: 1px solid #27AE60; 
            display: block;
        }
        
        .error { 
            background: rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.2); 
            color: #E74C3C; 
            border: 1px solid #E74C3C; 
            display: block;
        }
        
        .warning { 
            background: rgba(243, 156, 18, 0.2); 
            color: #F39C12; 
            border: 1px solid #F39C12; 
            display: block;
        }
        
        /* Instructions */
        .instructions {
            margin-top: 30px;
            padding: 20px;
            background: rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.8);
            border-radius: 10px;
            border: 1px solid #34495E;
        }
        
        .instructions h3 {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            color: #FFD700;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .instructions p {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            line-height: 1.5;
            color: #AAAAAA;
        }
        
        .instructions ol {
            padding-left: 20px;
            color: #AAAAAA;
        }
        
        .instructions li {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        
        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            body {
                padding: 10px;
            }
            
            #company-logo {
                font-size: 28px;
                margin-top: 10px;
            }
            
            .card-id-display {
                font-size: 13px;
                padding: 6px 20px;
            }
            
            .role-cards {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
            
            .role-card {
                min-width: 100%;
            }
            
            .message-type-selector {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .button-group {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
            
            .btn {
                width: 100%;
                margin: 5px 0;
            }
            
            .tab-container {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Logo and Card ID Container -->
    <div class="logo-container">
        <!-- YOUR BEAUTIFUL LOGO -->
        <div id="company-logo">
            MAG<span class="magic-i">I</span>C CARD
        </div>
        
        <!-- Card ID Display - CENTERED UNDER LOGO -->
        <div class="card-id-display" id="cardIdDisplay">
            <i class="fas fa-qrcode"></i> Card: Loading...
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Connection Status -->
    <div class="connection-status" id="connectionStatus"></div>
    
    <!-- Initial Role Selection -->
    <div class="role-selection" id="roleSelection">
        <h2 class="role-title">Are you the Sender or Receiver?</h2>
        <div class="role-cards">
            <!-- Sender Card -->
            <div class="role-card" onclick="selectRole('sender')" id="senderCard">
                <div class="role-icon sender">
                    <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i>
                </div>
                <h3>I'm the Sender</h3>
                <p>Upload a magical message (text, image, video, or audio) to this card</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Receiver Card -->
            <div class="role-card" onclick="selectRole('receiver')" id="receiverCard">
                <div class="role-icon receiver">
                    <i class="fas fa-gift"></i>
                </div>
                <h3>I'm the Receiver</h3>
                <p>View the magical message sent to this card, experience it in AR</p>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <div class="instructions">
            <h3><i class="fas fa-star"></i> How This Works</h3>
            <ol>
                <li><strong>Sender</strong> scans QR → Uploads message</li>
                <li><strong>Receiver</strong> scans same QR → Views message</li>
                <li>Message appears in Augmented Reality! ✨</li>
            </ol>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- SENDER SECTION (Hidden by default) -->
    <div class="content-section" id="senderSection">
        <button class="back-button" onclick="goBackToRoles()">
            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i> Back to Role Selection
        </button>
        
        <h2 class="section-title"><i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i> Upload Magical Message</h2>
        <p style="text-align: center; color: #AAAAAA; margin-bottom: 20px;">You're uploading a message to this card. The receiver will see it when they scan the same QR code.</p>
        
        <!-- Loading State -->
        <div class="loading" id="senderLoading">
            <div class="spinner"></div>
            <p>Checking for existing messages...</p>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Upload Form (shown when no message exists) -->
        <div id="uploadForm" style="display: none;">
            <!-- Message Type Selection -->
            <div class="message-type-selector">
                <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('text')" data-type="text">
                    <i class="fas fa-font"></i>
                    <div>Text</div>
                </div>
                <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('image')" data-type="image">
                    <i class="fas fa-image"></i>
                    <div>Image</div>
                </div>
                <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('video')" data-type="video">
                    <i class="fas fa-video"></i>
                    <div>Video</div>
                </div>
                <div class="type-option" onclick="selectMessageType('audio')" data-type="audio">
                    <i class="fas fa-music"></i>
                    <div>Audio</div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Text Input -->
            <div id="textInputSection">
                <label style="color: #FFD700; font-weight: bold; display: block; margin-bottom: 8px;">Your Magical Message:</label>
                <textarea id="messageText" placeholder="Type your heartfelt message here..." 
                          oninput="updatePreview()"></textarea>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Media Upload -->
            <div id="mediaUploadSection" style="display: none;">
                <label style="color: #FFD700; font-weight: bold; display: block; margin-bottom: 8px;">Upload File:</label>
                <div class="file-upload-area" onclick="document.getElementById('fileInput').click()">
                    <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt"></i>
                    <h3>Click to Upload</h3>
                    <p>Images, Videos, or Audio files</p>
                    <p><small>Max 50MB</small></p>
                </div>
                <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept="image/*,video/*,audio/*" 
                       style="display: none;" onchange="handleFileUpload(this.files[0])">
                <div id="mediaPreview"></div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Message Preview -->
            <div class="preview-area">
                <label style="color: #FFD700; font-weight: bold; display: block; margin-bottom: 8px;">
                    <i class="fas fa-eye"></i> Message Preview:
                </label>
                <div class="preview-content" id="messagePreview">
                    Your message preview will appear here
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Upload Button -->
            <div class="button-group">
                <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="uploadMessage()" id="uploadBtn">
                    <i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Message Already Exists -->
        <div id="messageExistsSection" style="display: none;">
            <div class="message-box">
                <h3 style="color: #FFD700; margin-bottom: 15px;"><i class="fas fa-gift"></i> Message Already Uploaded!</h3>
                <p style="color: #AAAAAA; margin-bottom: 15px;">This card already has a message from the sender.</p>
                <div class="preview-content" id="existingMessagePreview">
                    Loading message...
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="button-group">
                <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="replaceMessage()">
                    <i class="fas fa-sync"></i> REPLACE MESSAGE
                </button>
                <button class="btn btn-danger" onclick="deleteMessage()">
                    <i class="fas fa-trash"></i> DELETE MESSAGE
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- RECEIVER SECTION (Hidden by default) -->
    <div class="content-section" id="receiverSection">
        <button class="back-button" onclick="goBackToRoles()">
            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i> Back to Role Selection
        </button>
        
        <h2 class="section-title"><i class="fas fa-gift"></i> View Magical Message</h2>
        <p style="text-align: center; color: #AAAAAA; margin-bottom: 20px;">You're viewing a message sent to this card. Experience it in Augmented Reality!</p>
        
        <!-- Loading State -->
        <div class="loading" id="receiverLoading">
            <div class="spinner"></div>
            <p>Loading message...</p>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Message Display -->
        <div id="receiverContent" style="display: none;">
            <div class="tab-container">
                <div class="tab active" onclick="showReceiverTab('view')">View Message</div>
                <div class="tab" onclick="showReceiverTab('ar')">AR Experience</div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- View Tab -->
            <div id="viewTab">
                <div class="message-box" id="receiverMessage">
                    <!-- Message will be displayed here -->
                </div>
                
                <div class="button-group">
                    <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="viewInAR()" id="arBtn" disabled>
                        <i class="fas fa-vr-cardboard"></i> VIEW IN AR
                    </button>
                    <button class="btn btn-purple" onclick="shareMessage()" id="shareBtn" disabled>
                        <i class="fas fa-share-alt"></i> SHARE
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- AR Tab -->
            <div id="arTab" style="display: none;">
                <div class="instructions" style="text-align: center;">
                    <h3><i class="fas fa-camera"></i> How to View in AR</h3>
                    <p>Scan this card's QR code with the AR viewer to see the message in augmented reality!</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="button-group">
                    <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="openARViewer()">
                        <i class="fas fa-external-link-alt"></i> OPEN AR VIEWER
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- No Message State -->
            <div id="noMessageSection" style="display: none;">
                <div class="message-box">
                    <h3 style="color: #FFD700; margin-bottom: 15px;"><i class="fas fa-envelope-open-text"></i> No Message Yet!</h3>
                    <p style="color: #AAAAAA; margin-bottom: 15px;">The sender hasn't uploaded a message to this card yet.</p>
                    <p style="color: #AAAAAA;">Please ask the sender to scan the QR code and upload a message.</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="instructions">
                    <h3><i class="fas fa-question-circle"></i> What to do:</h3>
                    <p style="color: #FFD700; margin-bottom: 10px;">If you're supposed to receive a message, ask the sender to:</p>
                    <ol>
                        <li>Scan the same QR code you scanned</li>
                        <li>Select "I'm the Sender"</li>
                        <li>Upload their magical message</li>
                    </ol>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Status Messages -->
    <div class="status" id="statusMessage"></div>

    <script>
        // Firebase Configuration
        const firebaseConfig = {
            apiKey: "AIzaSyB2KubmablXwpbSpMT8RCba_Na-7XnpuKY",
            authDomain: "magic-card-business.firebaseapp.com",
            projectId: "magic-card-business",
            storageBucket: "magic-card-business.firebasestorage.app",
            messagingSenderId: "837403328170",
            appId: "1:837403328170:web:3d768122e4d03b98905ad3"
        };
        
        // Initialize Firebase
        let db, storage;
        try {
            firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);
            db = firebase.firestore();
            storage = firebase.storage();
            console.log("Firebase initialized");
            document.getElementById('connectionStatus').textContent = "✅ Connected to cloud";
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Firebase error:", error);
            document.getElementById('connectionStatus').textContent = "⚠️ Working offline";
            document.getElementById('connectionStatus').style.color = "#F39C12";
        }
        
        // Global Variables
        let currentCardId = '';
        let currentMessage = null;
        let uploadedFile = null;
        let selectedMessageType = 'text';
        let currentRole = null;
        
        // DOM Elements
        const roleSelection = document.getElementById('roleSelection');
        const senderSection = document.getElementById('senderSection');
        const receiverSection = document.getElementById('receiverSection');
        const senderCard = document.getElementById('senderCard');
        const receiverCard = document.getElementById('receiverCard');
        const cardIdDisplay = document.getElementById('cardIdDisplay');
        
        // Initialize on load
        window.onload = async function() {
            // Get card ID from URL
            const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
            currentCardId = urlParams.get('card') || 'DEMO-CARD';
            
            // Display card ID - NOW CENTERED UNDER LOGO
            cardIdDisplay.innerHTML = `<i class="fas fa-qrcode"></i> Card: ${currentCardId}`;
            
            // Check for existing message in background
            await checkForMessage();
        };
        
        // Select Role (Sender or Receiver)
        function selectRole(role) {
            currentRole = role;
            
            // Update UI
            senderCard.classList.remove('active');
            receiverCard.classList.remove('active');
            
            if (role === 'sender') {
                senderCard.classList.add('active');
                roleSelection.style.display = 'none';
                senderSection.classList.add('active');
                loadSenderSection();
            } else {
                receiverCard.classList.add('active');
                roleSelection.style.display = 'none';
                receiverSection.classList.add('active');
                loadReceiverSection();
            }
        }
        
        // Go back to role selection
        function goBackToRoles() {
            senderSection.classList.remove('active');
            receiverSection.classList.remove('active');
            roleSelection.style.display = 'block';
            currentRole = null;
        }
        
        // Check Firebase for existing message
        async function checkForMessage() {
            if (!db) {
                console.log("No Firebase connection");
                return null;
            }
            
            try {
                const docRef = db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId);
                const doc = await docRef.get();
                
                if (doc.exists) {
                    currentMessage = doc.data();
                    return currentMessage;
                }
                return null;
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Error checking message:', error);
                return null;
            }
        }
        
        // Load sender section
        async function loadSenderSection() {
            const senderLoading = document.getElementById('senderLoading');
            const uploadForm = document.getElementById('uploadForm');
            const messageExistsSection = document.getElementById('messageExistsSection');
            
            // Show loading
            senderLoading.style.display = 'block';
            uploadForm.style.display = 'none';
            messageExistsSection.style.display = 'none';
            
            // Check for existing message
            await checkForMessage();
            
            // Hide loading
            senderLoading.style.display = 'none';
            
            if (currentMessage) {
                // Show existing message
                messageExistsSection.style.display = 'block';
                displayExistingMessage();
            } else {
                // Show upload form
                uploadForm.style.display = 'block';
                selectMessageType('text');
            }
        }
        
        // Display existing message in sender section
        function displayExistingMessage() {
            const existingMessagePreview = document.getElementById('existingMessagePreview');
            
            let previewHTML = '<div style="text-align: center;">';
            
            if (currentMessage.type === 'text') {
                previewHTML += `<p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6;">${currentMessage.message || 'Text message'}</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'image') {
                previewHTML += `<img src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" class="media-preview" alt="Uploaded image">`;
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-image"></i> Image Message</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'video') {
                previewHTML += `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video message uploaded</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'audio') {
                previewHTML += `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio message uploaded</p>`;
            }
            
            if (currentMessage.createdAt) {
                const date = new Date(currentMessage.createdAt);
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; font-size: 12px; color: #AAAAAA;">
                    <i class="far fa-clock"></i> Uploaded: ${date.toLocaleDateString()}
                </p>`;
            }
            
            previewHTML += '</div>';
            existingMessagePreview.innerHTML = previewHTML;
        }
        
        // Load receiver section
        async function loadReceiverSection() {
            const receiverLoading = document.getElementById('receiverLoading');
            const receiverContent = document.getElementById('receiverContent');
            const noMessageSection = document.getElementById('noMessageSection');
            
            // Show loading
            receiverLoading.style.display = 'block';
            receiverContent.style.display = 'none';
            noMessageSection.style.display = 'none';
            
            // Check for message
            await checkForMessage();
            
            // Hide loading
            receiverLoading.style.display = 'none';
            receiverContent.style.display = 'block';
            
            if (currentMessage) {
                // Show message
                noMessageSection.style.display = 'none';
                displayReceiverMessage();
                showReceiverTab('view');
                
                // Enable buttons
                document.getElementById('arBtn').disabled = false;
                document.getElementById('shareBtn').disabled = false;
            } else {
                // Show no message state
                noMessageSection.style.display = 'block';
                document.getElementById('viewTab').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('arTab').style.display = 'none';
            }
        }
        
        // Display message in receiver section
        function displayReceiverMessage() {
            const receiverMessage = document.getElementById('receiverMessage');
            
            let messageHTML = '<div style="text-align: center;">';
            messageHTML += `<h3 style="color: #FFD700; margin-bottom: 20px;"><i class="fas fa-magic"></i> Your Magical Message</h3>`;
            
            if (currentMessage.type === 'text') {
                messageHTML += `<div style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6; padding: 15px; background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1); border-radius: 8px; border-left: 3px solid #FFD700;">
                    ${currentMessage.message.replace(/\n/g, '<br>')}
                </div>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'image') {
                messageHTML += `<img src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}" class="media-preview" alt="Image message">`;
                messageHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 15px; color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-image"></i> Image Message</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'video') {
                messageHTML += `<video controls class="media-preview">
                    <source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}">
                </video>`;
                messageHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 15px; color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video Message</p>`;
            } else if (currentMessage.type === 'audio') {
                messageHTML += `<audio controls style="width: 100%">
                    <source src="${currentMessage.mediaUrl}">
                </audio>`;
                messageHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 15px; color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio Message</p>`;
            }
            
            if (currentMessage.createdAt) {
                const date = new Date(currentMessage.createdAt);
                messageHTML += `<div style="margin-top: 20px; padding-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid #34495E; color: #AAAAAA;">
                    <i class="far fa-clock"></i> Received on ${date.toLocaleDateString()} at ${date.toLocaleTimeString()}
                </div>`;
            }
            
            messageHTML += '</div>';
            receiverMessage.innerHTML = messageHTML;
        }
        
        // SENDER FUNCTIONS
        
        function selectMessageType(type) {
            selectedMessageType = type;
            
            // Update UI
            document.querySelectorAll('.type-option').forEach(option => {
                option.classList.remove('selected');
            });
            document.querySelector(`.type-option[data-type="${type}"]`).classList.add('selected');
            
            // Show/hide appropriate sections
            const textInputSection = document.getElementById('textInputSection');
            const mediaUploadSection = document.getElementById('mediaUploadSection');
            
            if (type === 'text') {
                textInputSection.style.display = 'block';
                mediaUploadSection.style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('messageText').focus();
            } else {
                textInputSection.style.display = 'none';
                mediaUploadSection.style.display = 'block';
            }
            
            // Clear preview
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        function handleFileUpload(file) {
            if (!file) return;
            
            // Check file size (50MB limit)
            if (file.size > 50 * 1024 * 1024) {
                showStatus('File size exceeds 50MB limit', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            uploadedFile = file;
            const mediaPreview = document.getElementById('mediaPreview');
            mediaPreview.innerHTML = '';
            
            const reader = new FileReader();
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                let previewHTML = '';
                
                if (file.type.startsWith('image/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<img src="${e.target.result}" class="media-preview" alt="Preview">`;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('video/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-video"></i> Video file selected</p>`;
                } else if (file.type.startsWith('audio/')) {
                    previewHTML = `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-music"></i> Audio file selected</p>`;
                }
                
                previewHTML += `<p style="margin-top: 10px; color: #AAAAAA;">
                    <i class="fas fa-file"></i> ${file.name} (${(file.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB)
                </p>`;
                
                mediaPreview.innerHTML = previewHTML;
            };
            
            reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            updatePreview();
        }
        
        function updatePreview() {
            const messagePreview = document.getElementById('messagePreview');
            
            if (selectedMessageType === 'text') {
                const text = document.getElementById('messageText').value;
                if (text.trim()) {
                    messagePreview.textContent = text;
                } else {
                    messagePreview.innerHTML = '<span style="color: #AAAAAA; font-style: italic;">Type your message above to see preview</span>';
                }
            } else if (uploadedFile) {
                messagePreview.innerHTML = `<p style="color: #FFD700;"><i class="fas fa-file-upload"></i> Ready to upload:</p>
                    <p><strong>${uploadedFile.name}</strong></p>
                    <p style="color: #AAAAAA;">Size: ${(uploadedFile.size / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB</p>`;
            } else {
                messagePreview.innerHTML = '<span style="color: #AAAAAA; font-style: italic;">Select a file to upload</span>';
            }
        }
        
        async function uploadMessage() {
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('⚠️ No internet connection', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            const uploadBtn = document.getElementById('uploadBtn');
            uploadBtn.disabled = true;
            uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> UPLOADING...';
            
            let messageData = {
                cardId: currentCardId,
                type: selectedMessageType,
                createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
                status: 'active'
            };
            
            try {
                if (selectedMessageType === 'text') {
                    const text = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim();
                    if (!text) {
                        showStatus('Please type a message!', 'error');
                        uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                        uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE';
                        return;
                    }
                    messageData.message = text;
                    
                } else {
                    if (!uploadedFile) {
                        showStatus('Please select a file to upload', 'error');
                        uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                        uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE';
                        return;
                    }
                    
                    showStatus('Uploading file...', 'warning');
                    
                    const storageRef = storage.ref();
                    const fileName = `${currentCardId}_${Date.now()}_${uploadedFile.name.replace(/\s+/g, '_')}`;
                    const fileRef = storageRef.child(`cards/${currentCardId}/${fileName}`);
                    
                    const snapshot = await fileRef.put(uploadedFile);
                    const downloadURL = await snapshot.ref.getDownloadURL();
                    
                    messageData.mediaUrl = downloadURL;
                    messageData.fileName = uploadedFile.name;
                    messageData.fileSize = uploadedFile.size;
                    messageData.fileType = uploadedFile.type;
                }
                
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).set(messageData);
                
                currentMessage = messageData;
                document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('messageExistsSection').style.display = 'block';
                displayExistingMessage();
                
                showStatus('✅ Message saved to cloud! ✨', 'success');
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                    uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE';
                }, 1000);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Upload error:', error);
                showStatus('❌ Save failed. Try again.', 'error');
                uploadBtn.disabled = false;
                uploadBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> UPLOAD MESSAGE';
            }
        }
        
        function replaceMessage() {
            document.getElementById('messageExistsSection').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'block';
            
            document.getElementById('messageText').value = '';
            document.getElementById('mediaPreview').innerHTML = '';
            uploadedFile = null;
            selectMessageType('text');
        }
        
        async function deleteMessage() {
            if (!confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this message?')) return;
            
            if (!db) {
                showStatus('⚠️ No internet - can\'t delete', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                await db.collection('cards').doc(currentCardId).delete();
                
                if (currentMessage.mediaUrl) {
                    try {
                        const fileRef = storage.refFromURL(currentMessage.mediaUrl);
                        await fileRef.delete();
                    } catch (storageError) {
