let currentCardUrl = ''; // Show/hide message section addNowSelect.addEventListener('change', function() { if (this.value === 'yes') { messageSection.style.display = 'block'; } else { messageSection.style.display = 'none'; } }); // Show/hide media upload messageTypeSelect.addEventListener('change', function() { const type = this.value; if (type === 'text') { textInput.style.display = 'block'; mediaSection.style.display = 'none'; } else { textInput.style.display = 'none'; mediaSection.style.display = 'block'; } }); // Handle file upload fileInput.addEventListener('change', function(e) { const file = e.target.files[0]; if (!file) return; uploadedFile = file; mediaPreview.innerHTML = ''; if (file.type.startsWith('image/')) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function(e) { mediaPreview.innerHTML = `<img src="${e.target.result}" style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 200px; border-radius: 8px;">`; }; reader.readAsDataURL(file); } else if (file.type.startsWith('video/')) { const url = URL.createObjectURL(file); mediaPreview.innerHTML = ` <video controls style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 200px; border-radius: 8px;"> <source src="${url}" type="${file.type}"> </video> `; } else if (file.type.startsWith('audio/')) { const url = URL.createObjectURL(file); mediaPreview.innerHTML = ` <audio controls style="width: 100%;"> <source src="${url}" type="${file.type}"> </audio> `; } showStatus(`✅ ${file.name} loaded`, 'success'); }); // 🚀 MAIN FUNCTION: Generate EMPTY QR Code async function generateQRCode() { const cardId = document.getElementById('cardId').value.trim(); if (!cardId) { showStatus('❌ Please enter a Card ID', 'error'); return; } currentCardId = cardId; // Create EMPTY QR code URL currentCardUrl = `https://magic-card-business.vercel.app/view.html?card=${encodeURIComponent(cardId)}`; console.log("Generating EMPTY QR for:", currentCardUrl); // Show loading document.getElementById('qrcode').innerHTML = '<div class="loading">Generating QR code...</div>'; generateBtn.disabled = true; generateBtn.textContent = 'Generating...'; showStatus('⏳ Generating empty QR code...', 'success'); // Generate QR code using the NEW library try { // Clear previous QR code document.getElementById('qrcode').innerHTML = ''; // Generate QR code using the new library QRCode.toCanvas(document.getElementById('qrcode'), currentCardUrl, { width: 256, margin: 2, color: { dark: '#000000', light: '#FFFFFF' } }, function (error, canvas) { if (error) { console.error("QR generation error:", error); document.getElementById('qrcode').innerHTML = 'Error generating QR code'; showStatus('❌ Error generating QR: ' + error.message, 'error'); generateBtn.disabled = false; generateBtn.textContent = '🪄 GENERATE EMPTY QR CODE'; return; } // Style the canvas canvas.style.maxWidth = '100%'; canvas.style.height = 'auto'; canvas.style.borderRadius = '8px'; canvas.style.boxShadow = '0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'; // Store for download currentQRCodeUrl = canvas.toDataURL('image/png'); // Show card info document.getElementById('displayCardId').textContent = cardId; document.getElementById('displayCardUrl').textContent = currentCardUrl; // Enable buttons document.getElementById('copyBtn').disabled = false; document.getElementById('testBtn').disabled = false; document.getElementById('downloadBtn').disabled = false; generateBtn.disabled = false; generateBtn.textContent = '🪄 GENERATE EMPTY QR CODE'; // 🔥 OPTIONAL: Save default message to Firebase if (addNowSelect.value === 'yes') { saveMessageToFirebase(cardId); } else { showStatus('✅ Empty QR code generated! Ready to print.', 'success'); } }); } catch (error) { console.error("QR generation error:", error); document.getElementById('qrcode').innerHTML = 'Error generating QR'; showStatus('❌ Error: ' + error.message, 'error'); generateBtn.disabled = false; generateBtn.textContent = '🪄 GENERATE EMPTY QR CODE'; } } // 🔥 Save message to Firebase (optional) async function saveMessageToFirebase(cardId) { const messageType = document.getElementById('messageType').value; let messageData = {}; if (messageType === 'text') { const messageText = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim(); if (!messageText) { showStatus('⚠ Please enter a message', 'warning'); return; } messageData = { cardId: cardId, type: 'text', message: messageText, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), status: 'ready' }; } else if (uploadedFile) { // Upload file to Firebase Storage showStatus('⏳ Uploading file to Firebase...', 'success'); try { // Create storage reference const storageRef = storage.ref(); const fileName = `${Date.now()}_${uploadedFile.name}`; const fileRef = storageRef.child(`cards/${cardId}/${fileName}`); // Upload file const snapshot = await fileRef.put(uploadedFile); const downloadURL = await snapshot.ref.getDownloadURL(); messageData = { cardId: cardId, type: messageType, mediaUrl: downloadURL, fileName: uploadedFile.name, fileSize: uploadedFile.size, fileType: uploadedFile.type, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), status: 'ready' }; } catch (error) { console.error("File upload error:", error); showStatus('❌ Failed to upload file', 'error'); return; } } else { showStatus('⚠ Please upload a file', 'warning'); return; } // Save to Firestore try { await db.collection('cards').doc(cardId).set(messageData); showStatus('✅ QR code generated and message saved to Firebase!', 'success'); } catch (error) { console.error("Firestore error:", error); showStatus('⚠ QR generated, but failed to save message', 'warning'); } } function copyURL() { if (!currentCardUrl) return; navigator.clipboard.writeText(currentCardUrl).then(() => { showStatus('✅ URL copied to clipboard!', 'success'); }); } function testQR() { if (!currentCardUrl) return; window.open(currentCardUrl, '_blank'); } function downloadQR() { if (!currentQRCodeUrl) return; const link = document.createElement('a'); link.download = `magic-card-${currentCardId}-qr.png`; link.href = currentQRCodeUrl; document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); document.body.removeChild(link); showStatus('✅ QR code downloaded!', 'success'); } function showStatus(message, type) { const statusDiv = document.getElementById('status'); statusDiv.textContent = message; statusDiv.className = 'status ' + type; statusDiv.style.display = 'block'; setTimeout(() => { statusDiv.style.display = 'none'; }, 5000); } // Auto-generate random card ID on load window.onload = function() { const randomId = 'CARD' + Math.floor(1000 + Math.random() * 9000); document.getElementById('cardId').value = randomId; // Test QRCode library if (typeof QRCode === 'undefined') { showStatus('❌ QRCode library failed to load. Please refresh.', 'error'); } else { showStatus('✅ Ready! Enter Card ID and click GENERATE', 'success'); } }; </script> </body> </html> and fix any bugs you see
what does the view.html do?
for the view.html page, i want a sender and a reciever area to the page, the sender has the option to scan the printed qr code generated by qr-generator.html and which brings them to an upload page where they can upload either texts, images, video or audio and saves it to that unique qr code. the reciever then recieves that card and then scans that same qr code with their phone and sees the message from the sender in AR. this is my current view page <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Magic Card - Upload</title> <style> body { font-family: Arial; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); padding: 20px; text-align: center; } .container { background: white; border-radius: 15px; padding: 30px; max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); } h1 { color: #333; } .card-id { background: #667eea; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 20px; display: inline-block; margin: 20px 0; } .message-box { background: #f8f9fa; padding: 20px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0; min-height: 100px; border: 2px dashed #667eea; } textarea { width: 100%; height: 150px; padding: 15px; border: 2px solid #667eea; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 20px; } button { background: #667eea; color: white; border: none; padding: 15px 30px; font-size: 18px; border-radius: 10px; cursor: pointer; margin: 10px; } .success { background: #28a745; } .error { background: #dc3545; color: white; padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0; } </style> <!-- FIREBASE --> <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-app.js"></script> <script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.0.0/firebase-firestore.js"></script> <script> const firebaseConfig = { apiKey: "AIzaSyB2KubmablXwpbSpMT8RCba_Na-7XnpuKY", authDomain: "magic-card-business.firebaseapp.com", projectId: "magic-card-business", storageBucket: "magic-card-business.firebasestorage.app", messagingSenderId: "837403328170", appId: "1:837403328170:web:3d768122e4d03b98905ad3" }; // Initialize Firebase let db; try { firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig); db = firebase.firestore(); console.log("✅ Firebase connected!"); } catch (error) { console.log("❌ Firebase error:", error); } </script> </head> <body> <div class="container"> <h1>🎴 MAGIC CARD</h1> <div class="card-id" id="cardIdDisplay">Loading...</div> <div id="loading"> <h2>Loading...</h2> <p>Checking for messages...</p> </div> <div id="noMessage" style="display:none;"> <h2>✨ No Message Yet!</h2> <p>This card is waiting for its first magical message!</p> <div class="message-box"> <textarea id="messageText" placeholder="Type your magical message here...">Happy Birthday! 🎂✨</textarea> <button onclick="saveMessage()" class="success">🚀 SAVE MESSAGE</button> </div> </div> <div id="hasMessage" style="display:none;"> <h2>📜 Current Message:</h2> <div class="message-box" id="currentMessage"> Loading message... </div> <button onclick="showUploadForm()">📝 NEW MESSAGE</button> <button onclick="viewInAR()" class="success">🔮 VIEW IN AR</button> </div> <div id="uploadForm" style="display:none;"> <h2>📝 New Message</h2> <div class="message-box"> <textarea id="newMessageText" placeholder="Type new message..."></textarea> <button onclick="saveNewMessage()" class="success">💾 SAVE NEW MESSAGE</button> <button onclick="cancelUpload()">↩️ CANCEL</button> </div> </div> <div id="status" style="display:none;"></div> <div style="margin-top: 30px; padding: 20px; background: #e8f4fd; border-radius: 10px;"> <h3>🎯 How This Works:</h3> <p>1. Upload message here</p> <p>2. Receiver scans QR code</p> <p>3. Message appears in AR! ✨</p> </div> </div> <script> // Get card ID from URL function getCardId() { const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return urlParams.get('card') || 'TEST123'; } // Show status message function showStatus(message, isError = false) { const statusDiv = document.getElementById('status'); statusDiv.innerHTML = message; statusDiv.className = isError ? 'error' : ''; statusDiv.style.display = 'block'; setTimeout(() => { statusDiv.style.display = 'none'; }, 3000); } // Load message from Firebase async function loadMessage() { const cardId = getCardId(); document.getElementById('cardIdDisplay').textContent = `Card: ${cardId}`; if (!db) { showStatus("⚠️ No internet connection", true); document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; return; } try { const doc = await db.collection('cards').doc(cardId).get(); if (doc.exists) { const data = doc.data(); document.getElementById('currentMessage').textContent = data.message || data.type || 'Message loaded'; document.getElementById('hasMessage').style.display = 'block'; } else { document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; } document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; } catch (error) { console.error("Load error:", error); showStatus("⚠️ Connection error. Trying offline mode...", true); document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; } } // Save message to Firebase async function saveMessage() { const cardId = getCardId(); const message = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim(); if (!message) { showStatus("Please type a message!", true); return; } if (!db) { showStatus("⚠️ No internet - can't save", true); return; } try { await db.collection('cards').doc(cardId).set({ cardId: cardId, type: 'text', message: message, createdAt: new Date().toISOString() }); showStatus("✅ Message saved to cloud! ✨"); setTimeout(() => { location.reload(); }, 1500); } catch (error) { console.error("Save error:", error); showStatus("❌ Save failed. Try again.", true); } } // UI functions function showUploadForm() { document.getElementById('hasMessage').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'block'; } function cancelUpload() { location.reload(); } async function saveNewMessage() { await saveMessage(); } function viewInAR() { const cardId = getCardId(); window.location.href = `index.html?card=${encodeURIComponent(cardId)}`; } // Start on load window.onload = loadMessage; </script> </body> </html> also include my magic card logo with the star above the I. also in the sender section have a windo to preview the message that is going to be uploaded
I like this but can the sender and reciever be two first options, then chosing the sender option drop down and shows the sender options etc, and same for the reciever option
i like this but take the logo from this code <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Magic Card - Upload</title> <style> body { font-family: Arial; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); margin: 20px 0; min-height: 100px; border: 2px dashed #667eea; } textarea { width: 100%; height: 150px; padding: 15px; border: 2px solid #667eea; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 20px; } </script> </head> <body> <div class="container"> <h1>🎴 MAGIC CARD</h1> <div class="card-id" id="cardIdDisplay">Loading...</div> <div id="loading"> <h2>Loading...</h2> <p>Checking for messages...</p> </div> <div id="noMessage" style="display:none;"> <h2>✨ No Message Yet!</h2> <p>This card is waiting for its first magical message!</p> <div class="message-box"> <textarea id="messageText" placeholder="Type your magical message here...">Happy Birthday! 🎂✨</textarea> <button onclick="saveMessage()" class="success">🚀 SAVE MESSAGE</button> </div> </div> <div id="hasMessage" style="display:none;"> <h2>📜 Current Message:</h2> <div class="message-box" id="currentMessage"> Loading message... </div> <button onclick="showUploadForm()">📝 NEW MESSAGE</button> <button onclick="viewInAR()" class="success">🔮 VIEW IN AR</button> </div> <div id="uploadForm" style="display:none;"> <h2>📝 New Message</h2> <div class="message-box"> <textarea id="newMessageText" placeholder="Type new message..."></textarea> <button onclick="saveNewMessage()" class="success">💾 SAVE NEW MESSAGE</button> <button onclick="cancelUpload()">↩️ CANCEL</button> </div> </div> <div id="status" style="display:none;"></div> <div style="margin-top: 30px; padding: 20px; background: #e8f4fd; border-radius: 10px;"> <h3>🎯 How This Works:</h3> <p>1. Upload message here</p> <p>2. Receiver scans QR code</p> <p>3. Message appears in AR! ✨</p> </div> </div> <script> // Get card ID from URL function getCardId() { const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return urlParams.get('card') || 'TEST123'; } // Show status message function showStatus(message, isError = false) { const statusDiv = document.getElementById('status'); statusDiv.innerHTML = message; statusDiv.className = isError ? 'error' : ''; statusDiv.style.display = 'block'; setTimeout(() => { statusDiv.style.display = 'none'; }, 3000); } // Load message from Firebase async function loadMessage() { const cardId = getCardId(); document.getElementById('cardIdDisplay').textContent = `Card: ${cardId}`; if (!db) { showStatus("⚠️ No internet connection", true); document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; return; } try { const doc = await db.collection('cards').doc(cardId).get(); if (doc.exists) { const data = doc.data(); document.getElementById('currentMessage').textContent = data.message || data.type || 'Message loaded'; document.getElementById('hasMessage').style.display = 'block'; } else { document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; } document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; } catch (error) { console.error("Load error:", error); showStatus("⚠️ Connection error. Trying offline mode...", true); document.getElementById('noMessage').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none'; } } // Save message to Firebase async function saveMessage() { const cardId = getCardId(); const message = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim(); if (!message) { showStatus("Please type a message!", true); return; } if (!db) { showStatus("⚠️ No internet - can't save", true); return; } try { await db.collection('cards').doc(cardId).set({ cardId: cardId, type: 'text', message: message, createdAt: new Date().toISOString() }); showStatus("✅ Message saved to cloud! ✨"); setTimeout(() => { location.reload(); }, 1500); } catch (error) { console.error("Save error:", error); showStatus("❌ Save failed. Try again.", true); } } // UI functions function showUploadForm() { document.getElementById('hasMessage').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('uploadForm').style.display = 'block'; } function cancelUpload() { location.reload(); } async function saveNewMessage() { await saveMessage(); } function viewInAR() { const cardId = getCardId(); window.location.href = `index.html?card=${encodeURIComponent(cardId)}`; } // Start on load window.onload = loadMessage; </script> </body> </html> and put the logo in my view.html page. make the theme and colors the same
sorry i meant to put this code so you can copy the theme and the logo from this code to put into the view.html code <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Magic Card AR</title> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, user-scalable=no"> <script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.4.0/aframe.min.js"></script> <style> * { margin: 0; padding: 0; } body { background: black; overflow: hidden; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; } /* Company Logo - YOUR BEAUTIFUL LOGO */ #company-logo { position: fixed; top: 25px; left: 0; width: 100%; color: white; text-align: center; font-size: 32px; font-weight: bold; z-index: 1000; } .magic-i { position: relative; display: inline-block; color: #FFD700; } .magic-i::before { content: "★"; position: absolute; top: -15px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); font-size: 14px; color: #FFD700; } /* INSTRUCTIONS - UNDER LOGO */ #instructions { position: fixed; top: 75px; left: 0; width: 100%; color: #AAAAAA; text-align: center; font-size: 14px; z-index: 1000; padding: 0 20px; line-height: 1.4; } /* Card ID Display - NEW */ #card-id-display { position: fixed; top: 100px; left: 0; width: 100%; color: #FFD700; text-align: center; font-size: 14px; z-index: 1001; display: none; } /* Connection Status - NEW */ #connection-status { position: fixed; top: 120px; left: 0; width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 12px; color: #28a745; z-index: 1002; } #magic-btn { position: fixed; bottom: 50px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); background: #2C3E50; color: white; border: none; padding: 16px 40px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 8px; z-index: 1003; cursor: pointer; border: 1px solid #34495E; transition: all 0.3s; } #magic-btn:hover { background: #34495E; transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-2px); } #magic-btn:disabled { opacity: 0.5; cursor: not-allowed; } #video-controls { position: fixed; bottom: 20px; left: 0; width: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); padding: 12px 15px; z-index: 1004; display: none; border-top: 1px solid #333; } #timeline-container { width: 100%; height: 6px; background: #444; border-radius: 3px; margin-bottom: 14px; cursor: pointer; } #progress-bar { height: 100%; background: #FFD700; border-radius: 3px; width: 0%; } .controls-row { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; } .time-display { color: #AAA; font-size: 13px; font-family: monospace; min-width: 80px; } .buttons-container { display: flex; gap: 8px; } .control-btn { background: #2C3E50; color: white; border: none; padding: 6px 12px; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 12px; min-width: 60px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 4px; transition: all 0.3s; } .control-btn:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); } #play-pause-btn { background: #27AE60; } #stop-btn { background: #E74C3C; } #save-btn { background: #9B59B6; } .control-btn:disabled { opacity: 0.5; cursor: not-allowed; transform: none; } /* Card message display */ #card-message { position: fixed; top: 140px; left: 0; width: 100%; color: #FFD700; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; z-index: 1005; padding: 0 20px; display: none; } /* Error message */ #error-message { position: fixed; top: 160px; left: 0; width: 100%; color: #FF6B6B; text-align: center; font-size: 14px; z-index: 1006; padding: 0 20px; display: none; } /* Loading spinner */ .spinner { position: fixed; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); border-radius: 50%; border-top: 4px solid #FFD700; width: 40px; height: 40px; animation: spin 1s linear infinite; display: none; z-index: 1007; } @keyframes spin { 0% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(360deg); } } /* Share Button - NEW */ #share-btn { position: fixed; bottom: 120px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2); color: #FFD700; border: 1px solid #FFD700; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 14px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; transition: all 0.3s; z-index: 1008; display: none; } #share-btn:hover { background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3); transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-2px); } </style> </head> <body> <!-- YOUR BEAUTIFUL LOGO --> <div id="company-logo"> MAG<span class="magic-i">I</span>C CARD </div> <!-- Loading Spinner --> <div class="spinner" id="loading-spinner"></div> <!-- Instructions --> <div id="instructions"> Loading magic... </div> <!-- Card ID Display --> <div id="card-id-display"></div> <!-- Connection Status --> <div id="connection-status"></div> <!-- Card Message Display --> <div id="card-message"></div> <!-- Error Message Display --> <div id="error-message"></div> <!-- Share Button --> <button id="share-btn"> <span>📤</span> SHARE THIS CARD </button> <!-- Magic Button --> <button id="magic-btn">LOADING...</button> <!-- Video Controls --> <div id="video-controls"> <div id="timeline-container"> <div id="progress-bar"></div> </div> <div class="controls-row"> <div class="time-display"> <span id="current-time">0:00</span> / <span id="total-time">0:00</span> </div> <div class="buttons-container"> <button id="play-pause-btn" class="control-btn"> <span>⏸</span> <span>PAUSE</span> </button> <button id="stop-btn" class="control-btn"> <span>⏹</span> <span>STOP</span> </button> <button id="save-btn" class="control-btn"> <span>💾</span> <span>SAVE</span> </button> </div> </div> </div> <!-- A-FRAME SCENE --> <a-scene embedded> <a-camera></a-camera> <a-light type="ambient" color="#FFFFFF" intensity="0.8"></a-light> <a-entity position="0 0 -2"> <!-- Wooden Frame --> <a-box id="wood-frame" width="2.0" height="1.4" depth="0.08" position="0 0.8 0" rotation="-10 0 0" color="#8B7355" roughness="0.7" visible="false"> </a-box> <!-- Video screen --> <a-plane id="video-screen" width="1.85" height="1.25" position="0 0.8 0.05" rotation="-10 0 0" material="side: double; color: #000000" visible="false"> <a-video id="ar-video" width="1.85" height="1.25" position="0 0 0.01"> </a-video> </a-plane> <!-- Text Display --> <a-text id="text-display" value="" color="#FFFFFF" align="center" width="1.8" position="0 0.8 0.05" rotation="-10 0 0" visible="false"> </a-text> <!-- Image Display --> <a-image id="image-display" width="1.85" height="1.25" position="0 0.8 0.05" rotation="-10 0 0" visible="false"> </a-image> </a-entity> </a-scene> <script> document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { // Get all elements const magicBtn = document.getElementById('magic-btn'); const woodFrame = document.getElementById('wood-frame'); const videoScreen = document.getElementById('video-screen'); const textDisplay = document.getElementById('text-display'); const imageDisplay = document.getElementById('image-display'); const videoControls = document.getElementById('video-controls'); const progressBar = document.getElementById('progress-bar'); const currentTimeEl = document.getElementById('current-time'); const totalTimeEl = document.getElementById('total-time'); const playPauseBtn = document.getElementById('play-pause-btn'); const stopBtn = document.getElementById('stop-btn'); const saveBtn = document.getElementById('save-btn'); const timelineContainer = document.getElementById('timeline-container'); const instructions = document.getElementById('instructions'); const cardMessageDiv = document.getElementById('card-message'); const errorMessageDiv = document.getElementById('error-message'); const loadingSpinner = document.getElementById('loading-spinner'); const cardIdDisplay = document.getElementById('card-id-display'); const connectionStatus = document.getElementById('connection-status'); const shareBtn = document.getElementById('share-btn'); // Variables let video = null; let currentMessageType = null; let currentMessageContent = ''; let cardId = ''; let fallbackData = null; // ====================== // 1. GET DATA FROM URL // ====================== function getCardIdFromUrl() { // Try new format: ?card=CARD123&message=Hello const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); const cardIdFromParam = urlParams.get('card'); const messageFromParam = urlParams.get('message'); if (cardIdFromParam || messageFromParam) { return { id: cardIdFromParam || 'PERSONAL', message: messageFromParam ? decodeURIComponent(messageFromParam) : '', isNewFormat: true }; } // Try old format: #BASE64_DATA const hash = window.location.hash.substring(1); if (!hash) { return null; } try { const decoded = atob(hash); const data = JSON.parse(decoded); return { id: data.card || 'MAGIC', message: data.message || '', isNewFormat: false, data: data }; } catch (error) { // If not JSON, use hash as message return { id: 'URL', message: decodeURIComponent(hash), isNewFormat: false }; } } // ====================== // 2. LOAD MESSAGE // ====================== function loadMessage() { console.log("🎴 Loading magic message..."); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'block'; magicBtn.disabled = true; instructions.textContent = "Decoding magic..."; const cardInfo = getCardIdFromUrl(); if (!cardInfo) { // No message in URL - show demo console.log("📭 No URL data, showing demo"); showDemo(); return; } // We have a message! cardId = cardInfo.id; currentMessageContent = cardInfo.message; fallbackData = cardInfo.data; // Determine message type if (cardInfo.data && cardInfo.data.type) { currentMessageType = cardInfo.data.type; } else if (currentMessageContent.match(/\.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif)$/i)) { currentMessageType = 'image'; } else if (currentMessageContent.match(/\.(mp4|webm|mov)$/i)) { currentMessageType = 'video'; } else if (currentMessageContent.match(/\.(mp3|wav|ogg)$/i)) { currentMessageType = 'audio'; } else { currentMessageType = 'text'; } console.log("📦 Loaded:", { cardId, type: currentMessageType, message: currentMessageContent.substring(0, 50) + '...' }); // Update UI cardIdDisplay.textContent = `Card: ${cardId}`; cardIdDisplay.style.display = 'block'; connectionStatus.textContent = "✅ Message loaded"; connectionStatus.style.color = "#28a745"; instructions.textContent = "Point camera → Tap button for magic"; magicBtn.textContent = `▶ PLAY ${cardId} MESSAGE`; magicBtn.style.background = '#27AE60'; // Show share button shareBtn.style.display = 'block'; // Setup the message setupMessage(); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none'; magicBtn.disabled = false; // Auto-play in 2 seconds setTimeout(() => { if (magicBtn.textContent.includes('PLAY')) { magicBtn.click(); } }, 2000); } // ====================== // 3. DEMO MODE // ====================== function showDemo() { console.log("🎭 Showing demo mode"); cardId = 'DEMO'; currentMessageType = 'text'; currentMessageContent = 'Welcome to Magic Card! ✨\nScan a QR code to see a real message.'; cardIdDisplay.textContent = `Demo Mode`; cardIdDisplay.style.display = 'block'; connectionStatus.textContent = "✨ Try a Magic Card QR code!"; connectionStatus.style.color = "#FFD700"; instructions.textContent = "Point camera → Tap button for demo"; magicBtn.textContent = '▶ PLAY DEMO'; magicBtn.style.background = '#F39C12'; setupMessage(); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none'; magicBtn.disabled = false; } // ====================== // 4. SETUP MESSAGE // ====================== function setupMessage() { console.log("🛠️ Setting up message type:", currentMessageType); // Clean up previous video if (video) { video.remove(); video = null; } if (currentMessageType === 'text') { textDisplay.setAttribute('value', currentMessageContent || 'Hello from Magic Card!'); } else if (currentMessageType === 'video' || currentMessageType === 'audio') { video = document.createElement('video'); video.id = 'message-video'; video.loop = true; video.playsInline = true; video.preload = 'auto'; video.muted = true; // Set video source if (currentMessageContent && currentMessageContent.startsWith('http')) { video.src = currentMessageContent; video.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'; } else if (fallbackData && fallbackData.message && fallbackData.message.startsWith('http')) { video.src = fallbackData.message; video.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'; } else if (currentMessageType === 'video') { // Default demo video video.src = 'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqa9qyvh/video/upload/v1767377987/20251219_010742000_iOS_xuandm.mp4'; video.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'; } else { // Default demo audio video.src = 'https://assets.mixkit.co/music/preview/mixkit-driving-ambition-32.mp4'; video.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'; } document.body.appendChild(video); // Connect to A-Frame const arVideo = document.getElementById('ar-video'); if (arVideo) { arVideo.setAttribute('src', '#message-video'); } } else if (currentMessageType === 'image') { if (currentMessageContent) { imageDisplay.setAttribute('src', currentMessageContent); } else if (fallbackData && fallbackData.message) { imageDisplay.setAttribute('src', fallbackData.message); } } console.log("✅ Message setup complete"); } // ====================== // 5. ERROR HANDLING // ====================== function showError(message) { errorMessageDiv.textContent = message; errorMessageDiv.style.display = 'block'; setTimeout(() => { errorMessageDiv.style.display = 'none'; }, 5000); } // ====================== // 6. TIME FORMATTING // ====================== function formatTime(seconds) { const mins = Math.floor(seconds / 60); const secs = Math.floor(seconds % 60); return `${mins}:${secs < 10 ? '0' : ''}${secs}`; } // ====================== // 7. VIDEO CONTROLS // ====================== function updateVideoProgress() { if (video && video.duration) { const percent = (video.currentTime / video.duration) * 100; progressBar.style.width = percent + '%'; currentTimeEl.textContent = formatTime(video.currentTime); } } function setupVideoHandlers() { if (!video) return; video.addEventListener('error', function(e) { console.error("❌ Video error:", e); showError('Media cannot load. Try again.'); }); video.addEventListener('timeupdate', updateVideoProgress); video.addEventListener('loadedmetadata', function() { if (video.duration) { totalTimeEl.textContent = formatTime(video.duration); } }); } // ====================== // 8. EVENT LISTENERS // ====================== // Timeline click to seek timelineContainer.addEventListener('click', function(e) { if (video && video.duration) { const rect = this.getBoundingClientRect(); const percent = (e.clientX - rect.left) / rect.width; video.currentTime = percent * video.duration; updateVideoProgress(); } }); // Play/Pause button playPauseBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { if (!video) return; if (video.paused) { video.play().then(() => { playPauseBtn.innerHTML = '<span>⏸</span> <span>PAUSE</span>'; playPauseBtn.style.background = '#27AE60'; }).catch(error => { console.error("❌ Play failed:", error); showError('Cannot play media. Try again.'); }); } else { video.pause(); playPauseBtn.innerHTML = '<span>▶</span> <span>PLAY</span>'; playPauseBtn.style.background = '#3498DB'; } }); // Stop button stopBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { if (!video) return; video.pause(); video.currentTime = 0; playPauseBtn.innerHTML = '<span>▶</span> <span>PLAY</span>'; playPauseBtn.style.background = '#3498DB'; updateVideoProgress(); }); // Save button saveBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { if (!video || !video.src) return; const a = document.createElement('a'); a.href = video.src; a.download = `Magic-Card-${cardId || 'Message'}.mp4`; const originalHTML = saveBtn.innerHTML; saveBtn.innerHTML = '<span>⏳</span> <span>SAVING...</span>'; saveBtn.style.background = '#FF9800'; saveBtn.disabled = true; document.body.appendChild(a); a.click(); document.body.removeChild(a); setTimeout(() => { const isIOS = /iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(navigator.userAgent); if (isIOS) { alert('📱 To save to Photos:\n1. Open Files app\n2. Find the video\n3. Tap Share → Save Video'); } else { alert('✅ Video saved! Check Downloads folder.'); } saveBtn.innerHTML = originalHTML; saveBtn.style.background = '#9B59B6'; saveBtn.disabled = false; }, 1500); }); // Share button shareBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { const shareUrl = window.location.href; const shareText = `Check out this Magic Card from ${cardId}!`; if (navigator.share) { navigator.share({ title: 'Magic Card', text: shareText, url: shareUrl }); } else { navigator.clipboard.writeText(shareUrl).then(() => { showError('✅ Link copied to clipboard!'); }); } }); // ====================== // 9. MAGIC BUTTON - MAIN TRIGGER // ====================== magicBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { console.log("🎯 Magic button clicked for:", cardId); magicBtn.textContent = 'LOADING...'; magicBtn.style.background = '#27AE60'; errorMessageDiv.style.display = 'none'; if (currentMessageType === 'text') { woodFrame.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); textDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); videoScreen.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); imageDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); videoControls.style.display = 'none'; magicBtn.style.display = 'none'; shareBtn.style.display = 'none'; instructions.textContent = `✨ Message from ${cardId}`; } else if (currentMessageType === 'image') { woodFrame.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); imageDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); videoScreen.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); textDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); videoControls.style.display = 'none'; magicBtn.style.display = 'none'; shareBtn.style.display = 'none'; instructions.textContent = `🖼️ Image from ${cardId}`; } else if (currentMessageType === 'video' || currentMessageType === 'audio') { woodFrame.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); videoScreen.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); textDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); imageDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); if (video) { setupVideoHandlers(); setTimeout(function() { video.muted = false; video.play().then(function() { magicBtn.style.display = 'none'; shareBtn.style.display = 'none'; videoControls.style.display = 'block'; instructions.textContent = `🎬 ${currentMessageType === 'video' ? 'Video' : 'Audio'} from ${cardId}`; if (video.duration && totalTimeEl.textContent === '0:00') { totalTimeEl.textContent = formatTime(video.duration); } }).catch(function(error) { console.error("❌ Video play failed:", error); showError('Cannot play media. Tap to try again.'); magicBtn.textContent = `▶ PLAY ${cardId}`; magicBtn.style.background = '#E74C3C'; magicBtn.style.display = 'block'; }); }, 800); } } }); // ====================== // 10. INITIALIZE // ====================== console.log("🚀 Initializing Magic Card..."); setTimeout(function() { loadMessage(); }, 1000); }); </script> </body> </html>
i lke this but now can you center "card demo card" under the magic card logo
I like this view.html final look
let. clean up the maker.html page this is the current code <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Magic Card QR Generator</title> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> <style> * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a2e 0%, #16213e 100%); min-height: 100vh; padding: 20px; } .container { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; background: white; border-radius: 20px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.4); } .header { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); color: white; padding: 40px 30px; text-align: center; } .logo { font-size: 42px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 15px; } .magic-i { position: relative; display: inline-block; color: #FFD700; } .magic-i::before { content: "★"; position: absolute; top: -20px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); font-size: 18px; color: #FFD700; } .subtitle { font-size: 18px; opacity: 0.9; margin-top: 10px; } .content { padding: 40px; } .form-section { background: #f8f9fa; padding: 30px; border-radius: 15px; margin-bottom: 30px; } .form-group { margin-bottom: 25px; } label { display: block; margin-bottom: 10px; font-weight: bold; color: #333; font-size: 16px; } input, textarea, select { width: 100%; padding: 16px; border: 2px solid #e0e0e0; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 16px; transition: all 0.3s; font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; } input:focus, textarea:focus, select:focus { outline: none; border-color: #667eea; box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1); } textarea { height: 150px; resize: vertical; } .char-counter { text-align: right; font-size: 14px; color: #666; margin-top: 5px; } .char-counter.warning { color: #ff9800; } .char-counter.error { color: #f44336; } .file-upload-section { border: 3px dashed #667eea; border-radius: 15px; padding: 40px; text-align: center; background: #f0f4ff; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s; margin-top: 20px; } .file-upload-section:hover { background: #e6ebff; border-color: #5a67d8; } .upload-icon { font-size: 64px; color: #667eea; margin-bottom: 20px; } .file-preview { margin-top: 25px; text-align: center; } .preview-image { max-width: 300px; max-height: 200px; border-radius: 10px; border: 3px solid #667eea; margin-bottom: 15px; } .file-info { background: #e8f4fd; padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; margin-top: 15px; } .message-type-selector { display: flex; gap: 15px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .type-option { flex: 1; padding: 20px; border: 2px solid #e0e0e0; border-radius: 10px; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s; background: white; } .type-option:hover { border-color: #667eea; transform: translateY(-2px); } .type-option.active { border-color: #667eea; background: #f0f4ff; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.2); } .type-icon { font-size: 32px; margin-bottom: 10px; display: block; } .generate-btn { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); color: white; border: none; padding: 20px; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 12px; width: 100%; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s; margin-top: 20px; } .generate-btn:hover { transform: translateY(-3px); box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4); } .generate-btn:disabled { opacity: 0.5; cursor: not-allowed; transform: none; } .result-section { background: #f8f9fa; padding: 30px; border-radius: 15px; text-align: center; display: none; } .result-title { color: #333; margin-bottom: 25px; font-size: 24px; } #qrcode { margin: 25px auto; padding: 25px; background: white; border-radius: 15px; min-height: 350px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; } .qr-placeholder { font-size: 48px; color: #ddd; margin-bottom: 15px; } .qr-canvas { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border: 15px solid white; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .card-info { background: #fff3cd; padding: 20px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 25px 0; text-align: left; } .card-info h3 { color: #856404; margin-bottom: 10px; } .action-buttons { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr)); gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; } .action-btn { padding: 16px; border: none; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 10px; transition: all 0.3s; } .action-btn:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); } .view-btn { background: #28a745; color: white; } .download-btn { background: #007bff; color: white; } .share-btn { background: #6f42c1; color: white; } .new-btn { background: #6c757d; color: white; } .status { padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; display: none; } .success { background: #d4edda; color: #155724; border: 1px solid #c3e6cb; } .error { background: #f8d7da; color: #721c24; border: 1px solid #f5c6cb; } .warning { background: #fff3cd; color: #856404; border: 1px solid #ffeaa7; } .instructions { background: #e8f4fd; border: 2px solid #b3d9ff; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; margin-top: 30px; line-height: 1.6; } .instructions h3 { color: #0056b3; margin-bottom: 15px; } @media (max-width: 768px) { .container { border-radius: 15px; } .header { padding: 30px 20px; } .logo { font-size: 32px; } .content { padding: 20px; } .form-section, .result-section { padding: 20px; } .action-buttons { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .message-type-selector { flex-direction: column; } } </style> <!-- QR Code Library --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/qrcode@1.5.3/build/qrcode.min.js"></script> </head> <body> <div class="container"> <div class="header"> <div class="logo"> MAG<span class="magic-i">I</span>C CARD </div> <div class="subtitle">Create magical QR codes for physical greeting cards</div> </div> <div class="content"> <div class="form-section"> <h2 style="color: #333; margin-bottom: 25px; text-align: center;">🎴 Create Your Magic Card</h2> <div class="form-group"> <label for="cardId">📝 Card ID (Required):</label> <input type="text" id="cardId" placeholder="e.g., BIRTHDAY001, WEDDING123" value="BIRTHDAY001"> <div style="color: #666; font-size: 14px; margin-top: 5px;"> Make this UNIQUE for each card you print </div> </div> <div class="message-type-selector"> <div class="type-option active" data-type="text" onclick="selectMessageType('text')"> <span class="type-icon">📝</span> <div style="font-weight: bold;">Text Message</div> <div style="font-size: 14px; color: #666;">Text only</div> </div> <div class="type-option" data-type="image" onclick="selectMessageType('image')"> <span class="type-icon">🖼️</span> <div style="font-weight: bold;">Image Card</div> <div style="font-size: 14px; color: #666;">Upload image</div> </div> <div class="type-option" data-type="video" onclick="selectMessageType('video')"> <span class="type-icon">🎬</span> <div style="font-weight: bold;">Video Card</div> <div style="font-size: 14px; color: #666;">Upload video</div> </div> </div> <!-- Text Input Section --> <div id="text-section" class="form-group"> <label for="messageText">💬 Your Message:</label> <textarea id="messageText" placeholder="Type your magical message here... Examples: 🎂 Happy Birthday! Wishing you an amazing day! 💝 Congratulations on your wedding! 🎉 Thank you for being an awesome friend! ✨ Thinking of you today!">Happy Birthday! 🎂 Wishing you an amazing day filled with joy and laughter! ✨</textarea> <div id="charCounter" class="char-counter">0/500 characters</div> </div> <!-- File Upload Section --> <div id="file-section" class="form-group" style="display: none;"> <label>📁 Upload Media File:</label> <div class="file-upload-section" onclick="document.getElementById('fileInput').click()"> <div class="upload-icon">📁</div> <h3 style="color: #667eea; margin-bottom: 10px;">Click to Upload</h3> <p>Drag & drop or click to select file</p> <p style="color: #666; font-size: 14px; margin-top: 10px;"> Supported: JPG, PNG, GIF, MP4, MOV, MP3<br> Max file size: 50MB </p> </div> <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept="image/*,video/*,audio/*" style="display: none;"> <div class="file-preview" id="filePreview"></div> </div> <button class="generate-btn" onclick="generateQRCode()" id="generateBtn"> 🪄 GENERATE MAGIC QR CODE </button> <div id="status" class="status"></div> </div> <div class="result-section" id="resultSection"> <h2 class="result-title">✅ Your Magic Card is Ready!</h2> <div id="qrcode"> <div class="qr-placeholder">🔮</div> <p>QR code will appear here</p> </div> <div class="card-info"> <h3>📋 Card Details:</h3> <p><strong>Card ID:</strong> <span id="displayCardId">-</span></p> <p><strong>Type:</strong> <span id="displayCardType">-</span></p> <p><strong>Message:</strong> <span id="displayMessage">-</span></p> <p><strong>URL:</strong> <span id="displayUrl" style="word-break: break-all; font-size: 12px;">-</span></p> </div> <div class="action-buttons"> <button class="action-btn view-btn" onclick="testQR()" id="testBtn"> 🔮 VIEW IN AR </button> <button class="action-btn download-btn" onclick="downloadQR()" id="downloadBtn"> ⬇️ DOWNLOAD QR </button> <button class="action-btn share-btn" onclick="shareCard()" id="shareBtn"> 📤 SHARE CARD </button> <button class="action-btn new-btn" onclick="createNewCard()"> 🆕 NEW CARD </button> </div> <div class="instructions"> <h3>🎯 How to Use Your Magic Card:</h3> <p>1. <strong>Download the QR code</strong> and print it on physical card stock</p> <p>2. <strong>Give/send the card</strong> to your recipient</p> <p>3. <strong>Recipient scans QR</strong> with phone camera</p> <p>4. <strong>Magic appears in AR!</strong> Your message displays in augmented reality ✨</p> <p style="margin-top: 15px; color: #0056b3; font-weight: bold;"> 💡 Tip: Test the QR code with your phone before printing! </p> </div> </div> </div> </div> <script> // ====================== // VARIABLES // ====================== let currentQRCodeUrl = null; let currentCardId = ''; let currentCardUrl = ''; let uploadedFile = null; let currentMessageType = 'text'; // ====================== // 1. MESSAGE TYPE SELECTOR // ====================== function selectMessageType(type) { currentMessageType = type; // Update UI document.querySelectorAll('.type-option').forEach(option => { option.classList.remove('active'); }); document.querySelector(`.type-option[data-type="${type}"]`).classList.add('active'); // Show/hide sections if (type === 'text') { document.getElementById('text-section').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('file-section').style.display = 'none'; } else { document.getElementById('text-section').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('file-section').style.display = 'block'; } showStatus('✨ ' + (type === 'text' ? 'Text mode' : type === 'image' ? 'Image mode' : 'Video mode') + ' selected', 'success'); } // ====================== // 2. CHARACTER COUNTER // ====================== const messageText = document.getElementById('messageText'); const charCounter = document.getElementById('charCounter'); messageText.addEventListener('input', function() { const length = this.value.length; charCounter.textContent = `${length}/500 characters`; if (length > 450) { charCounter.className = 'char-counter warning'; } else if (length > 500) { charCounter.className = 'char-counter error'; } else { charCounter.className = 'char-counter'; } }); // ====================== // 3. FILE UPLOAD HANDLER // ====================== document.getElementById('fileInput').addEventListener('change', function(e) { const file = e.target.files[0]; if (!file) return; uploadedFile = file; const previewDiv = document.getElementById('filePreview'); previewDiv.innerHTML = ''; // Check file size (50MB max) if (file.size > 50 * 1024 * 1024) { showStatus('❌ File too large (max 50MB)', 'error'); uploadedFile = null; return; } // Show preview based on file type if (file.type.startsWith('image/')) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function(e) { previewDiv.innerHTML = ` <img src="${e.target.result}" class="preview-image" alt="Preview"> <div class="file-info"> <p><strong>✓ Ready to upload:</strong> ${file.name}</p> <p>Size: ${(file.size / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(2)} MB</p> <p>Type: ${file.type}</p> </div> `; }; reader.readAsDataURL(file); } else if (file.type.startsWith('video/')) { const url = URL.createObjectURL(file); previewDiv.innerHTML = ` <video controls class="preview-image"> <source src="${url}" type="${file.type}"> </video> <div class="file-info"> <p><strong>✓ Ready to upload:</strong> ${file.name}</p> <p>Size: ${(file.size / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(2)} MB</p> <p>Type: ${file.type}</p> </div> `; } else if (file.type.startsWith('audio/')) { const url = URL.createObjectURL(file); previewDiv.innerHTML = ` <audio controls style="width: 100%; margin: 15px 0;"> <source src="${url}" type="${file.type}"> </audio> <div class="file-info"> <p><strong>✓ Ready to upload:</strong> ${file.name}</p> <p>Size: ${(file.size / 1024).toFixed(2)} KB</p> <p>Type: ${file.type}</p> </div> `; } else { previewDiv.innerHTML = ` <div class="file-info"> <p><strong>✓ File selected:</strong> ${file.name}</p> <p>Size: ${(file.size / 1024).toFixed(2)} KB</p> <p>Type: ${file.type}</p> </div> `; } showStatus(`✅ ${file.name} loaded (${(file.size / 1024).toFixed(0)} KB)`, 'success'); }); // ====================== // 4. GENERATE QR CODE (FIXED EMOJI ISSUE) // ====================== async function generateQRCode() { const cardId = document.getElementById('cardId').value.trim(); if (!cardId) { showStatus('❌ Please enter a Card ID', 'error'); return; } currentCardId = cardId; // Disable generate button while working const generateBtn = document.getElementById('generateBtn'); generateBtn.disabled = true; generateBtn.textContent = 'Creating Magic...'; // Show loading document.getElementById('qrcode').innerHTML = '<div class="qr-placeholder">⏳</div><p>Generating QR code...</p>'; showStatus('⏳ Creating your magic QR code...', 'success'); try { let messageData = {}; let displayMessage = ''; if (currentMessageType === 'text') { const messageText = document.getElementById('messageText').value.trim(); if (!messageText) { showStatus('❌ Please enter a message', 'error'); generateBtn.disabled = false; generateBtn.textContent = '🪄 GENERATE MAGIC QR CODE'; return; } // ✅ FIXED: Properly encode emojis for URL displayMessage = messageText; messageData = { card: cardId, type: 'text', // ✅ FIX: Use encodeURIComponent for emojis message: messageText }; } else { if (!uploadedFile) { showStatus('❌ Please select a file to upload', 'error'); generateBtn.disabled = false; generateBtn.textContent = '🪄 GENERATE MAGIC QR CODE'; return; } // For files, we'll create a simpler URL structure displayMessage = `Media file: ${uploadedFile.name}`; messageData = { card: cardId, type: currentMessageType, fileName: uploadedFile.name, fileSize: uploadedFile.size, // Note: In real app, you'd upload to server and get URL // For now, we'll use data URL (limited size) message: 'Media file uploaded' }; } // ✅ FIXED: Proper encoding for QR data // Method 1: Base64 encoding (handles emojis properly) const jsonString = JSON.stringify(messageData); const base64Data = btoa(unescape(encodeURIComponent(jsonString))); currentCardUrl = `https://magic-card-business.vercel.app/index.html#${base64Data}`; // Alternative Method 2: URL parameters (for simple text) const simpleUrl = `https://magic-card-business.vercel.app/index.html?card=${encodeURIComponent(cardId)}&message=${encodeURIComponent(displayMessage.substring(0, 100))}`; console.log('Generating QR for URL:', currentCardUrl); // Generate QR code const qrContainer = document.getElementById('qrcode'); qrContainer.innerHTML = ''; QRCode.toCanvas(qrContainer, currentCardUrl, { width: 256, margin: 2, color: { dark: '#000000', light: '#FFFFFF' }, errorCorrectionLevel: 'H' // High error correction for better scanning }, function (error, canvas) { if (error) { console.error('QR generation error:', error); qrContainer.innerHTML = '<div style="color: #f44336; padding: 20px;">❌ Error generating QR code</div>'; showStatus('❌ Failed to generate QR code', 'error'); generateBtn.disabled = false; generateBtn.textContent = '🪄 GENERATE MAGIC QR CODE'; return; } // Style the canvas canvas.className = 'qr-canvas'; // Store QR data URL for download currentQRCodeUrl = canvas.toDataURL('image/png'); // Update display information document.getElementById('displayCardId').textContent = cardId; document.getElementById('displayCardType').textContent = currentMessageType === 'text' ? 'Text Card' : currentMessageType === 'image' ? 'Image Card' : 'Video Card'; document.getElementById('displayMessage').textContent = displayMessage.substring(0, 100) + (displayMessage.length > 100 ? '...' : ''); document.getElementById('displayUrl').textContent = simpleUrl; // Show result section document.getElementById('resultSection').style.display = 'block'; // Scroll to results document.getElementById('resultSection').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); // Enable buttons document.getElementById('testBtn').disabled = false; document.getElementById('downloadBtn').disabled = false; document.getElementById('shareBtn').disabled = false; // Reset generate button generateBtn.disabled = false; generateBtn.textContent = '🪄 GENERATE MAGIC QR CODE'; showStatus('✅ Magic QR code created successfully!', 'success'); }); } catch (error) { console.error('Generation error:', error); showStatus('❌ Error: ' + error.message, 'error'); generateBtn.disabled = false; generateBtn.textContent = '🪄 GENERATE MAGIC QR CODE'; } } // ====================== // 5. DOWNLOAD QR CODE (FIXED AUTO-DOWNLOAD) // ====================== function downloadQR() { if (!currentQRCodeUrl) { showStatus('❌ No QR code to download', 'error'); return; } try { // ✅ FIXED: Proper download with correct filename const link = document.createElement('a'); link.href = currentQRCodeUrl; link.download = `Magic-Card-${currentCardId}-QR.png`; // Append to body, click, and remove document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); document.body.removeChild(link); showStatus('✅ QR code downloaded as PNG!', 'success'); } catch (error) { console.error('Download error:', error); showStatus('❌ Download failed. Try right-clicking the QR and "Save image as"', 'error'); } } // ====================== // 6. TEST QR CODE // ====================== function testQR() { if (!currentCardUrl) { showStatus('❌ No QR code to test', 'error'); return; } window.open(currentCardUrl, '_blank'); showStatus('🔮 Opening AR viewer in new tab...', 'success'); } // ====================== // 7. SHARE CARD // ====================== function shareCard() { if (!currentCardUrl) { showStatus('❌ No card to share', 'error'); return; } const shareData = { title: 'Magic Card', text: `Check out this Magic Card: ${currentCardId}`, url: currentCardUrl }; if (navigator.share) { navigator.share(shareData) .then(() => showStatus('✅ Card shared successfully!', 'success')) .catch(error => { if (error.name !== 'AbortError') { copyToClipboard(currentCardUrl); } }); } else { copyToClipboard(currentCardUrl); } } function copyToClipboard(text) { navigator.clipboard.writeText(text) .then(() => showStatus('✅ Card link copied to clipboard!', 'success')) .catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = text; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showStatus('✅ Card link copied to clipboard!', 'success'); }); } // ====================== // 8. CREATE NEW CARD // ====================== function createNewCard() { // Reset form document.getElementById('cardId').value = 'CARD' + Math.floor(1000 + Math.random() * 9000); document.getElementById('messageText').value = ''; document.getElementById('filePreview').innerHTML = ''; uploadedFile = null; // Hide result section document.getElementById('resultSection').style.display = 'none'; // Reset to text mode selectMessageType('text'); // Scroll to top document.getElementById('cardId').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); showStatus('✨ Ready to create a new Magic Card!', 'success'); } // ====================== // 9. STATUS MESSAGES // ====================== function showStatus(message, type) { const statusDiv = document.getElementById('status'); statusDiv.textContent = message; statusDiv.className = 'status ' + type; statusDiv.style.display = 'block'; // Auto-hide after 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { statusDiv.style.display = 'none'; }, 5000); } // ====================== // 10. INITIALIZATION // ====================== window.onload = function() { // Generate random card ID const randomId = 'CARD' + Math.floor(1000 + Math.random() * 9000); document.getElementById('cardId').value = randomId; // Initialize character counter const initialLength = document.getElementById('messageText').value.length; document.getElementById('charCounter').textContent = `${initialLength}/500 characters`; // Check QRCode library if (typeof QRCode === 'undefined') { showStatus('❌ QRCode library failed to load. Please refresh.', 'error'); } else { showStatus('✅ Ready to create Magic Cards!', 'success'); } }; </script> </body> </html> but can you add the theme and the logo from this code <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Magic Card AR</title> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, user-scalable=no"> <script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.4.0/aframe.min.js"></script> <style> * { margin: 0; padding: 0; } body { background: black; overflow: hidden; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; } /* Company Logo - YOUR BEAUTIFUL LOGO */ #company-logo { position: fixed; top: 25px; left: 0; width: 100%; color: white; text-align: center; font-size: 32px; font-weight: bold; z-index: 1000; } .magic-i { position: relative; display: inline-block; color: #FFD700; } .magic-i::before { content: "★"; } #magic-btn:disabled { opacity: 0.5; cursor: not-allowed; } #video-controls { position: fixed; bottom: 20px; left: 0; width: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); padding: 12px 15px; z-index: 1004; display: none; border-top: 1px solid #333; } #timeline-container { width: 100%; height: 6px; background: #444; border-radius: 3px; margin-bottom: 14px; cursor: pointer; } #progress-bar { height: 100%; background: #FFD700; border-radius: 3px; width: 0%; } .controls-row { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; } .time-display { color: #AAA; font-size: 13px; font-family: monospace; min-width: 80px; } .buttons-container { display: flex; gap: 8px; } .control-btn { background: #2C3E50; color: white; border: none; padding: 6px 12px; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 12px; min-width: 60px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 4px; transition: all 0.3s; } .control-btn:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); } #play-pause-btn { background: #27AE60; } #stop-btn { background: #E74C3C; } #save-btn { background: #9B59B6; } .control-btn:disabled { opacity: 0.5; cursor: not-allowed; transform: none; } /* Card message display */ #card-message { position: fixed; top: 140px; left: 0; width: 100%; color: #FFD700; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; z-index: 1005; padding: 0 20px; display: none; } /* Error message */ #error-message { position: fixed; top: 160px; left: 0; width: 100%; color: #FF6B6B; text-align: center; font-size: 14px; z-index: 1006; padding: 0 20px; display: none; } /* Loading spinner */ .spinner { position: fixed; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); border-radius: 50%; border-top: 4px solid #FFD700; width: 40px; height: 40px; animation: spin 1s linear infinite; display: none; z-index: 1007; } @keyframes spin { 0% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(360deg); } } /* Share Button - NEW */ #share-btn { position: fixed; bottom: 120px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2); color: #FFD700; border: 1px solid #FFD700; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 14px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; transition: all 0.3s; z-index: 1008; display: none; } #share-btn:hover { background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3); transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-2px); } </style> </head> <body> <!-- YOUR BEAUTIFUL LOGO --> <div id="company-logo"> MAG<span class="magic-i">I</span>C CARD </div> <!-- Loading Spinner --> <div class="spinner" id="loading-spinner"></div> <!-- Instructions --> <div id="instructions"> Loading magic... </div> <!-- Card ID Display --> <div id="card-id-display"></div> <!-- Connection Status --> <div id="connection-status"></div> <!-- Card Message Display --> <div id="card-message"></div> <!-- Error Message Display --> <div id="error-message"></div> <!-- Share Button --> <button id="share-btn"> <span>📤</span> SHARE THIS CARD </button> <!-- Magic Button --> <button id="magic-btn">LOADING...</button> <!-- Video Controls --> <div id="video-controls"> <div id="timeline-container"> <div id="progress-bar"></div> </div> <div class="controls-row"> <div class="time-display"> <span id="current-time">0:00</span> / <span id="total-time">0:00</span> </div> <div class="buttons-container"> <button id="play-pause-btn" class="control-btn"> <span>⏸</span> <span>PAUSE</span> </button> <button id="stop-btn" class="control-btn"> <span>⏹</span> <span>STOP</span> </button> <button id="save-btn" class="control-btn"> <span>💾</span> <span>SAVE</span> </button> </div> </div> </div> <!-- A-FRAME SCENE --> <a-scene embedded> <a-camera></a-camera> <a-light type="ambient" color="#FFFFFF" intensity="0.8"></a-light> <a-entity position="0 0 -2"> <!-- Wooden Frame --> <a-box id="wood-frame" width="2.0" height="1.4" depth="0.08" position="0 0.8 0" rotation="-10 0 0" color="#8B7355" roughness="0.7" visible="false"> </a-box> <!-- Video screen --> <a-plane id="video-screen" width="1.85" height="1.25" position="0 0.8 0.05" rotation="-10 0 0" material="side: double; color: #000000" visible="false"> <a-video id="ar-video" width="1.85" height="1.25" position="0 0 0.01"> </a-video> </a-plane> <!-- Text Display --> <a-text id="text-display" value="" color="#FFFFFF" align="center" width="1.8" position="0 0.8 0.05" rotation="-10 0 0" visible="false"> </a-text> <!-- Image Display --> <a-image id="image-display" width="1.85" height="1.25" position="0 0.8 0.05" rotation="-10 0 0" visible="false"> </a-image> </a-entity> </a-scene> <script> document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { // Get all elements const magicBtn = document.getElementById('magic-btn'); const woodFrame = document.getElementById('wood-frame'); const videoScreen = document.getElementById('video-screen'); const textDisplay = document.getElementById('text-display'); const imageDisplay = document.getElementById('image-display'); const videoControls = document.getElementById('video-controls'); const progressBar = document.getElementById('progress-bar'); const currentTimeEl = document.getElementById('current-time'); const totalTimeEl = document.getElementById('total-time'); const playPauseBtn = document.getElementById('play-pause-btn'); const stopBtn = document.getElementById('stop-btn'); const saveBtn = document.getElementById('save-btn'); const timelineContainer = document.getElementById('timeline-container'); const instructions = document.getElementById('instructions'); const cardMessageDiv = document.getElementById('card-message'); const errorMessageDiv = document.getElementById('error-message'); const loadingSpinner = document.getElementById('loading-spinner'); const cardIdDisplay = document.getElementById('card-id-display'); const connectionStatus = document.getElementById('connection-status'); const shareBtn = document.getElementById('share-btn'); // Variables let video = null; let currentMessageType = null; let currentMessageContent = ''; let cardId = ''; let fallbackData = null; // ====================== // 1. GET DATA FROM URL // ====================== function getCardIdFromUrl() { // Try new format: ?card=CARD123&message=Hello const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); const cardIdFromParam = urlParams.get('card'); const messageFromParam = urlParams.get('message'); if (cardIdFromParam || messageFromParam) { return { id: cardIdFromParam || 'PERSONAL', message: messageFromParam ? decodeURIComponent(messageFromParam) : '', isNewFormat: true }; } // Try old format: #BASE64_DATA const hash = window.location.hash.substring(1); if (!hash) { return null; } try { const decoded = atob(hash); const data = JSON.parse(decoded); return { id: data.card || 'MAGIC', message: data.message || '', isNewFormat: false, data: data }; } catch (error) { // If not JSON, use hash as message return { id: 'URL', message: decodeURIComponent(hash), isNewFormat: false }; } } // ====================== // 2. LOAD MESSAGE // ====================== function loadMessage() { console.log("🎴 Loading magic message..."); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'block'; magicBtn.disabled = true; instructions.textContent = "Decoding magic..."; const cardInfo = getCardIdFromUrl(); if (!cardInfo) { // No message in URL - show demo console.log("📭 No URL data, showing demo"); showDemo(); return; } // We have a message! cardId = cardInfo.id; currentMessageContent = cardInfo.message; fallbackData = cardInfo.data; // Determine message type if (cardInfo.data && cardInfo.data.type) { currentMessageType = cardInfo.data.type; } else if (currentMessageContent.match(/\.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif)$/i)) { currentMessageType = 'image'; } else if (currentMessageContent.match(/\.(mp4|webm|mov)$/i)) { currentMessageType = 'video'; } else if (currentMessageContent.match(/\.(mp3|wav|ogg)$/i)) { currentMessageType = 'audio'; } else { currentMessageType = 'text'; } console.log("📦 Loaded:", { cardId, type: currentMessageType, message: currentMessageContent.substring(0, 50) + '...' }); // Update UI cardIdDisplay.textContent = `Card: ${cardId}`; cardIdDisplay.style.display = 'block'; connectionStatus.textContent = "✅ Message loaded"; connectionStatus.style.color = "#28a745"; instructions.textContent = "Point camera → Tap button for magic"; magicBtn.textContent = `▶ PLAY ${cardId} MESSAGE`; magicBtn.style.background = '#27AE60'; // Show share button shareBtn.style.display = 'block'; // Setup the message setupMessage(); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none'; magicBtn.disabled = false; // Auto-play in 2 seconds setTimeout(() => { if (magicBtn.textContent.includes('PLAY')) { magicBtn.click(); } }, 2000); } // ====================== // 3. DEMO MODE // ====================== function showDemo() { console.log("🎭 Showing demo mode"); cardId = 'DEMO'; currentMessageType = 'text'; currentMessageContent = 'Welcome to Magic Card! ✨\nScan a QR code to see a real message.'; cardIdDisplay.textContent = `Demo Mode`; cardIdDisplay.style.display = 'block'; connectionStatus.textContent = "✨ Try a Magic Card QR code!"; connectionStatus.style.color = "#FFD700"; instructions.textContent = "Point camera → Tap button for demo"; magicBtn.textContent = '▶ PLAY DEMO'; magicBtn.style.background = '#F39C12'; setupMessage(); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none'; magicBtn.disabled = false; } // ====================== // 4. SETUP MESSAGE // ====================== function setupMessage() { console.log("🛠️ Setting up message type:", currentMessageType); // Clean up previous video if (video) { video.remove(); video = null; } if (currentMessageType === 'text') { textDisplay.setAttribute('value', currentMessageContent || 'Hello from Magic Card!'); } else if (currentMessageType === 'video' || currentMessageType === 'audio') { video = document.createElement('video'); video.id = 'message-video'; video.loop = true; video.playsInline = true; video.preload = 'auto'; video.muted = true; // Set video source if (currentMessageContent && currentMessageContent.startsWith('http')) { video.src = currentMessageContent; video.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'; } else if (fallbackData && fallbackData.message && fallbackData.message.startsWith('http')) { video.src = fallbackData.message; video.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'; } else if (currentMessageType === 'video') { // Default demo video video.src = 'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqa9qyvh/video/upload/v1767377987/20251219_010742000_iOS_xuandm.mp4'; video.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'; } else { // Default demo audio video.src = 'https://assets.mixkit.co/music/preview/mixkit-driving-ambition-32.mp4'; video.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'; } document.body.appendChild(video); // Connect to A-Frame const arVideo = document.getElementById('ar-video'); if (arVideo) { arVideo.setAttribute('src', '#message-video'); } } else if (currentMessageType === 'image') { if (currentMessageContent) { imageDisplay.setAttribute('src', currentMessageContent); } else if (fallbackData && fallbackData.message) { imageDisplay.setAttribute('src', fallbackData.message); } } console.log("✅ Message setup complete"); } // ====================== // 5. ERROR HANDLING // ====================== function showError(message) { errorMessageDiv.textContent = message; errorMessageDiv.style.display = 'block'; setTimeout(() => { errorMessageDiv.style.display = 'none'; }, 5000); } // ====================== // 6. TIME FORMATTING // ====================== function formatTime(seconds) { const mins = Math.floor(seconds / 60); const secs = Math.floor(seconds % 60); return `${mins}:${secs < 10 ? '0' : ''}${secs}`; } // ====================== // 7. VIDEO CONTROLS // ====================== function updateVideoProgress() { if (video && video.duration) { const percent = (video.currentTime / video.duration) * 100; progressBar.style.width = percent + '%'; currentTimeEl.textContent = formatTime(video.currentTime); } } function setupVideoHandlers() { if (!video) return; video.addEventListener('error', function(e) { console.error("❌ Video error:", e); showError('Media cannot load. Try again.'); }); video.addEventListener('timeupdate', updateVideoProgress); video.addEventListener('loadedmetadata', function() { if (video.duration) { totalTimeEl.textContent = formatTime(video.duration); } }); } // ====================== // 8. EVENT LISTENERS // ====================== // Timeline click to seek timelineContainer.addEventListener('click', function(e) { if (video && video.duration) { const rect = this.getBoundingClientRect(); const percent = (e.clientX - rect.left) / rect.width; video.currentTime = percent * video.duration; updateVideoProgress(); } }); // Play/Pause button playPauseBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { if (!video) return; if (video.paused) { video.play().then(() => { playPauseBtn.innerHTML = '<span>⏸</span> <span>PAUSE</span>'; playPauseBtn.style.background = '#27AE60'; }).catch(error => { console.error("❌ Play failed:", error); showError('Cannot play media. Try again.'); }); } else { video.pause(); playPauseBtn.innerHTML = '<span>▶</span> <span>PLAY</span>'; playPauseBtn.style.background = '#3498DB'; } }); // Stop button stopBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { if (!video) return; video.pause(); video.currentTime = 0; playPauseBtn.innerHTML = '<span>▶</span> <span>PLAY</span>'; playPauseBtn.style.background = '#3498DB'; updateVideoProgress(); }); // Save button saveBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { if (!video || !video.src) return; const a = document.createElement('a'); a.href = video.src; a.download = `Magic-Card-${cardId || 'Message'}.mp4`; const originalHTML = saveBtn.innerHTML; saveBtn.innerHTML = '<span>⏳</span> <span>SAVING...</span>'; saveBtn.style.background = '#FF9800'; saveBtn.disabled = true; document.body.appendChild(a); a.click(); document.body.removeChild(a); setTimeout(() => { const isIOS = /iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(navigator.userAgent); if (isIOS) { alert('📱 To save to Photos:\n1. Open Files app\n2. Find the video\n3. Tap Share → Save Video'); } else { alert('✅ Video saved! Check Downloads folder.'); } saveBtn.innerHTML = originalHTML; saveBtn.style.background = '#9B59B6'; saveBtn.disabled = false; }, 1500); }); // Share button shareBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { const shareUrl = window.location.href; const shareText = `Check out this Magic Card from ${cardId}!`; if (navigator.share) { navigator.share({ title: 'Magic Card', text: shareText, url: shareUrl }); } else { navigator.clipboard.writeText(shareUrl).then(() => { showError('✅ Link copied to clipboard!'); }); } }); // ====================== // 9. MAGIC BUTTON - MAIN TRIGGER // ====================== magicBtn.addEventListener('click', function() { console.log("🎯 Magic button clicked for:", cardId); magicBtn.textContent = 'LOADING...'; magicBtn.style.background = '#27AE60'; errorMessageDiv.style.display = 'none'; if (currentMessageType === 'text') { woodFrame.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); textDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); videoScreen.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); imageDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); videoControls.style.display = 'none'; magicBtn.style.display = 'none'; shareBtn.style.display = 'none'; instructions.textContent = `✨ Message from ${cardId}`; } else if (currentMessageType === 'image') { woodFrame.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); imageDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); videoScreen.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); textDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); videoControls.style.display = 'none'; magicBtn.style.display = 'none'; shareBtn.style.display = 'none'; instructions.textContent = `🖼️ Image from ${cardId}`; } else if (currentMessageType === 'video' || currentMessageType === 'audio') { woodFrame.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); videoScreen.setAttribute('visible', 'true'); textDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); imageDisplay.setAttribute('visible', 'false'); if (video) { setupVideoHandlers(); setTimeout(function() { video.muted = false; video.play().then(function() { magicBtn.style.display = 'none'; shareBtn.style.display = 'none'; videoControls.style.display = 'block'; instructions.textContent = `🎬 ${currentMessageType === 'video' ? 'Video' : 'Audio'} from ${cardId}`; if (video.duration && totalTimeEl.textContent === '0:00') { totalTimeEl.textContent = formatTime(video.duration); } }).catch(function(error) { console.error("❌ Video play failed:", error); showError('Cannot play media. Tap to try again.'); magicBtn.textContent = `▶ PLAY ${cardId}`; magicBtn.style.background = '#E74C3C'; magicBtn.style.display = 'block'; }); }, 800); } } }); // ====================== // 10. INITIALIZE // ====================== console.log("🚀 Initializing Magic Card..."); setTimeout(function() { loadMessage(); }, 1000); }); </script> </body> </html> to it, also can you fix the code because the qr geneator still isnt working

for step 8 theres no "insert access to everyone" theres just these options " Search templates Search templates SELECT Enable read access for all users This policy gives read access to your table for all users via the SELECT operation. INSERT Enable insert for authenticated users only This policy gives insert access to your table for all authenticated users only. DELETE Enable delete for users based on user_id This policy assumes that your table has a column "user_id", and allows users to delete rows which the "user_id" column matches their ID INSERT Enable insert for users based on user_id This policy assumes that your table has a column "user_id", and allows users to insert rows which the "user_id" column matches their ID" tell me what to do next before moving onto step 9
for step 8.1 i dont see the option to switch from template to custom policy
i see the two policies, lets move to github & vercel

One more step before you proceed...
